Product Name: Mestic Cool Box Compressor MCCP-75 AC/DC Dual Zone
Product Description:
Mestic MCCP-75 Dual Zone Cool Box Compressor (AC/DC)

The Mestic MCCP-75 Dual Zone Cool Box Compressor (AC/DC) lets you cool and freeze at the same time, thanks to its two independently adjustable compartments. With a temperature range from -18°C to +20°C, each zone can be set to your desired level using the easy-to-use digital display.

Dual Temperature Zones for Flexibility

Part of Mestic's Performance line, the MCCP-75 Dual Zone Cool Box Compressor (AC/DC) is built to last, with a powerful compressor and robust insulation for reliable cooling wherever you go. The optional eco setting helps minimize energy consumption, making it a perfect choice for camping or extended trips. The Mestic MCCP-75 Dual Zone Cool Box Compressor (AC/DC) has two equally sized compartments that offer a total capacity of 75L, making it ideal for families and large gatherings. Each zone can be independently adjusted between -18°C and +20°C, giving you full control over your cooling and freezing needs.

Key Features

  • Dual zones for separate cooling and freezing
  • Temperature range from -18°C to +20°C
  • Digital display with two USB ports
  • Compatible with 12V - 24V and 100V - 240V power sources
  • Two-way lid for easy access
  • 75L capacity, great for families and large items

Perfect for the Road and Your Destination

User-friendliness is key at Mestic, and the MCCP-75 Dual Zone Cool Box Compressor (AC/DC) makes life easier with two 12V - 24V connections—one on each side. The lid opens from either side and can be fully removed, so you can quickly grab your chilled items. With both 12V - 24V and 100V - 240V power options, you can use the Mestic MCCP-75 Dual Zone Cool Box Compressor (AC/DC) virtually anywhere without needing an additional 230V adapter. Other handy features include two removable wire baskets and interior lighting for added convenience.

Why Choose the Mestic MCCP-75 Dual Zone Cool Box Compressor (AC/DC)?

Looking for a reliable, high-performance cooler with two separate temperature zones? The Mestic MCCP-75 Dual Zone Cool Box Compressor (AC/DC) is the ideal choice. With a 75L capacity, dual-zone cooling and freezing, and a wide temperature range of -18°C to +20°C, it’s perfect for family trips or outdoor adventures. Plus, it comes with all the necessary power cables for easy setup and use wherever you go.

Product Name: Westfield Pluto EXTRA LARGE 2.0 Caravan Air Full Awning
Product Description:
Westfield Pluto 2.0 XL Caravan Air Full Awning

Extra Large Inflatable Full Awing

The Westfield Pluto 2.0 XL Full Caravan Awning has a large depth compared to the standard Pluto 2.0, this is a luxury inflatable awning designed to withstand the elements. Available in a range of sizes including XS, S, M, L, XL. Created from high-quality, durable Hydrotech fabric material with HydraDore XT PRO high end double coating for the highest waterproof rating and protection from the sun. With a waterproof rating of 10,000mm, you can ensure you'll stay dry sheltered by this awning even in the harshest rain. The Westfield Pluto XL Awning runs across the whole length of your caravan. This ensures that all windows, doors and service flaps are easy to open by ensuring a perfect seal on the sides of your caravan to prevent wind and rain from getting in.

Featuring an Advanced Air System that uses a single point of inflation to allow you to set up your awning with ease. Additionally, the Pluto Air XL Awning can be deflated from this valve to allow you to take it down easily. This awning is annex ready, meaning you can fit at least one annex for additional storage space, or combine this with the annex inner tent to give yourself extra living and sleeping space. To install the annex simply pitch your awning as normal and use the built in zip to attach the annex onto the side of your awning, pump it up and peg! Simple.

Part of the Westfield Premium Series, this awning features three-layer air tubes and a unique AAS System, with which the air awning is inflated at a single point, allowing a quick and easy setup. Utilising Hydrotech CottonTouch fabric with its anti-condensation performance, amazing weather resistance and UV stability, no other awning could compete. With user-friendly features, premium materials and advanced technology there is no other awning like this on the market.

Pluto 2.0 Awning Key Features:

  • Larger depth than the standard Pluto awning
  • Draught skirt and wheel cover with ventilation panel
  • Hydrotech cotton touch fabric
  • Breathable fabric to avoid condensation with built-in ventilation in front and side panels
  • Advanced Air System and Super-Tubes with single inflation for easy setup
  • Added protection against harsh weather
  • Double mudwall for protection inside and out
  • Reflective storm straps with strap tidy pockets
  • Full front canopy for protection against the rain
  • Unique windows for maximum light and beautiful views
  • Compatible with annex for extended living space
  • Carry bag included for storage and travel

Product Name: Mestic Under Bench Caravan Campervan Air Conditioner BA-2600
Product Description:
Mestic BA-2600 Bench Air Conditioner

The Mestic BA-2600 Bench Air Conditioner offers a versatile and efficient solution for heating, cooling and ensuring year-round comfort. Whether you need cooling, heating, or dehumidifying, this unit has you covered. With a powerful cooling capacity of 2,650 W and a heating capacity of 3,290 W, the Mestic BA-2600 Bench Air Conditioner ensures a comfortable indoor environment no matter the season. The temperature is easily adjustable between 18°C and 30°C, so you can find the perfect setting for your comfort.

Designed for efficiency and eco-friendliness, the Mestic BA-2600 Bench Air Conditioner uses the R410-A refrigerant (GWP 2,088), delivering high performance for heating and cooling while minimizing environmental impact. Built to perform in extreme conditions, it operates smoothly in temperatures ranging from -15°C to +40°C, making it adaptable to a wide variety of settings.

Control the Mestic BA-2600 Bench Air Conditioner effortlessly with the included remote control or the Mestic Smart app, which lets you adjust settings from your smartphone for added convenience. With an airflow rate of 330 m³/h, the air conditioner provides quick cooling or heating, making it ideal for spaces that need fast temperature adjustment.

Thanks to its compact design and flexible functionality, the Mestic BA-2600 Bench Air Conditioner is perfect for both home and work environments. Whether you're looking to cool down on a hot day or warm up in the colder months, this air conditioner is a reliable and adaptable choice for heating or cooling any space.

Specifications

  • Mestic under bench air conditioning unit for vehicles up to 8m.
  • Operated with remote control or via the Mestic smart App.
  • Cooling capacity: 9000 BTU/h (2650w)
  • Heating capacity: 11200 BTU/h (3290w)
  • Consumption cooling: 4Amp (230v)
  • Consumption heating: 5Amp (230v
  • Airflow rate: 330m³/h
  • Setting range: 18°C to 30°C
  • Refrigerant: R410-A (GWP 2.088)
  • Operating temperature range: -15°C to +40°C
  • Cools, heats and dehumidifies
  • Night mode
  • Operation with remote control or via the Mestic smart App
  • Weight: 29Kg
  • Dimensions (HxWxL):  34 x 71 x 39.5cm
  • 2 year warranty

Product Name: Mestic 2-Burner Electric Camping Cooker MKT-200 Black
Product Description:
Mestic 2-Burner Electric Camping Cooker MKT-200 Black: Your Versatile 2-Burner Companion from Mestic

Whether you're rustling up a meal on your great camping adventure or cooking at home, the Mestic 2-Burner Electric Camping Cooker MKT-200 Black black is an ideal choice. This electric, freestanding 2-burner Mestic cooker makes preparing meals a breeze.

Easy and Efficient Cooking

With ample space for larger pans, you can easily prepare dishes for a good number of people, whether it's a single pan meal or something more elaborate. The Mestic 2-Burner Electric Camping Cooker MKT-200 Black is simple to connect to any standard socket. Its total power of 2500 W is split between two burners: a smaller 1000 W burner and a larger 1500 W burner. Each burner can be controlled independently by turning its knob to the desired setting, allowing you to achieve the perfect temperature. For guidance on settings, always refer to the manual.

Key Benefits of the Mestic 2-Burner Electric Camping Cooker MKT-200 Black

  • Individual Burner Control: Adjust each burner separately for tailored cooking.
  • Heat-Resistant Housing: Features a durable, heat-resistant black casing.
  • Overheating Protection: Ensures safe operation.
  • Indicator Light: A red light clearly shows when the cooker is on.
  • Non-Slip Feet: Keeps the appliance stable and secure during use.
  • Powerful Performance: Total power of 2500 W.

Compact and Safe Design

Measuring a compact 46.5 x 27 x 7.5 cm, the Mestic 2-Burner Electric Camping Cooker MKT-200 Black is easy to pack and take with you on holiday or when camping. Its non-slip feet provide stability, making it safe to use on various surfaces. Additionally, the Mestic cooker is equipped with overheating protection, giving you extra peace of mind while cooking. With the Mestic 2-Burner Electric Camping Cooker MKT-200 Black, whipping up multiple dishes simultaneously has never been simpler, from at home to during camping trips.

Product Name: Mestic Electric Motorhome Rooftop Air Conditioner RTA-2500L
Product Description:
Mestic Electric Motorhome Rooftop Air Conditioner RTA-2500L

Create your ideal climate on the road in the comfort of your campervan or caravan with the Mestic Electric Motorhome Rooftop Air Conditioner RTA-2500L. This versatile unit not only cools but also heats, thanks to its integrated heat pump, allowing you to set your perfect temperature between 16°C and 31°C.

Environmentally Friendly and Efficient Climate Control

The Mestic Electric Motorhome Rooftop Air Conditioner RTA-2500L is designed to cool, heat, or ventilate your campervan or caravan with impressive efficiency. With a cooling capacity of 2500 W and a heating capacity of 2750 W, it's a good fit for a campervan or caravan up to 8 metres long. The unit's casing is largely constructed from polypropylene, a robust yet lightweight material. The compact design of the Mestic Electric Motorhome Rooftop Air Conditioner RTA-2500L also ensures ample roof space remains for additional accessories like solar panels or a roof box. This Mestic air conditioner uses R290 gas, an incredibly environmentally friendly and efficient refrigerant with a Global Warming Potential (GWP) of just 3 – significantly lower than other common refrigerants suited for a campervan or caravan.

Main benefits

  • Cools, heats and ventilates your campervan or caravan
  • Cooling capacity: 2500 W
  • Heating capacity: 2750 W
  • Setting range: 16 °C to 31 °C
  • Polypropylene housing reduces weight
  • Adjustable air flow: controls volume to the left and right
  • Installation dimensions: 40 x 40 cm (even possible from 38 x 38 cm)
  • Dimensions: 96 x 58.5 x 25.9 cm (lxwxh)

Tailored Airflow and Smart Control

Enjoy personalised comfort in your campervan or caravan with the adjustable airflow with the Mestic Electric Motorhome Rooftop Air Conditioner RTA-2500L, allowing you to direct air left and right separately – perfect for avoiding draughts while you sleep. For a quieter night, you can opt for ventilation-only modes, and the handy timer function lets you decide exactly how long the air conditioner operates. For light sleepers, the unit features a sleep mode for even quieter performance. It even includes atmospheric LED lighting for added ambience. All these features can be effortlessly managed via the indoor unit's touchscreen display, the included remote control, or your smartphone using the Mestic app.

Cooling, heating, or ventilating, the Mestic Electric Motorhome Rooftop Air Conditioner RTA-2500L does it all, putting you in complete control of the climate inside your campervan or caravan. With its adjustable temperature range, environmentally friendly refrigerant, polypropylene housing, and intelligent airflow control, the Mestic Electric Motorhome Rooftop Air Conditioner RTA-2500L is a smart choice for any journey.

Product Name: Westfield Vega 2.0 Air Caravan Porch Awning
Product Description:
Westfield Vega 2.0 Caravan & Motorhome Porch Air Awnings

Inflatable Porch Awning

The Westfield Vega 2.0 Caravan and Motorhome Porch Awnings are part of the Westfield Vega 2.0 Range, including the similar Vega High 2.0 for motorhomes and the compact Vega 200 Partially Retracted Porch Awning. This awning is suitable for caravans and motorhomes and are available in different sizes to adapt to your needs. Sizes include; Caravan 200cm width, 330cm width, or 375cm width, and Motorhome 200cm width, 330cm width, or 375cm width. Choose between these  sizes to find the perfect fit for your caravan or motorhome. Featuring waterproof HydroTech Cotton Touch Fabric which is high quality and completely waterproof, ensuring your awning stays dry inside even in the wettest weather. This Westfield inflatable awning is also suitable for any season, providing UV protection, and shelter from the wind and rain.

With an advanced air system that allows you to inflate your awning from a single inflation point. Allowing you to inflate your awning and take it down easily from the same valve. Based on three layers of protection along with tried and tested one way valves and auto-close interconnections, using standard pump fittings for simplicity and ease of use. To inflate simply push the pump into the valve and blow it up, to deflate simply unscrew the valve and your awning will deflate. This awning is annex ready, meaning you can fit at least one annex for additional storage space, or combine this with the annex inner tent to give yourself extra living and sleeping space. To install the annex simply pitch your awning as normal and use the built in zip to attach the annex onto the side of your awning, pump it up and peg! Simple.

Part of the Westfield Premium Series, this awning features three-layer air tubes and a unique AAS System, with which the air awning is inflated at a single point, allowing a quick and easy setup. Utilising Hydrotech CottonTouch fabric with its anti-condensation performance, amazing weather resistance and UV stability, no other awning could compete. With user-friendly features, premium materials and advanced technology there is no other awning like this on the market.

Vega 2.0 Key Features:

  • Can be used as a canopy (without the side panels)
  • High quality luxury HydroTech cotton touch fabric material, suitable for any season
  • Advanced Air System with single inflation
  • Breathable, anti-condensation non fade fabric
  • Anti-weather system for added protection
  • Full ventilation front and side panels, additional built in ventilation for minimal condensation
  • Double mudwall for protection inside and out
  • Reflective storm straps with strap tidy pockets
  • Super-clear windows with zipped blinds for perfect views
  • Compatible with annex for extended living space
  • Double beading to allow connection into 4 and 6mm channels
  • Adjustable air beams to give better pitching options
  • Double pads for better fitting when used in conjunction with roll out canopies (Motorhome models only)

Inflatable Drive-Away Awning

This inflatable air awning features an extra-high rear tube for enhanced headroom and spaciousness, specifically for taller motorhomes. Protect the inside of your awning from rainy weather and dirt. Complete with a separate groundsheet for the tunnel area ensuring that this area is kept dry for walking in and out of the motorhome into your awning.

Made with high-quality HydroTech CottonTouch fabric with dual coating, offering a full waterproof rating of 10,000mm HH and a 50+ UV protection from the sun. Making this awning perfect for camping in all seasons, ensuring an excellent waterproof rating, tear resistance, and UV shielding. The Advanced Air System allows for easy and simply set up, with a single inflation point inflating this awning couldn't be quicker. Featuring panoramic tinted windows and zippered blinds for privacy. Allowing you to enjoy your awning in peace.

Part of the Westfield Premium Series, this awning features three-layer air tubes and a unique AAS System, with which the air awning is inflated at a single point, allowing a quick and easy setup. Utilising Hydrotech CottonTouch fabric with its anti-condensation performance, amazing weather resistance and UV stability, no other awning could compete. Product Description:
Westfield Eris Premium Air Annex for Campervan, Caravan, Motorhome Awning

Premium Living Annex

The Westfield Eris Premium Air Annex is an awning extension for your campervan, caravan and motorhome. Use this annex extension to expand your awnings living space. Use this space as an extra bedroom, kitchen space, or as additional storage. Designed for practicality and comfort in mind, this awning annex features tinted windows with privacy blinds for optimal lighting with clear views. This Westfield Awning Annex also features a double zip system, allowing you to use the existing side panels of your air awning as partition or room divider. Additionally, this annex comes with roof poles for added stability and durability to ensure that the roof is taut and well-supported.

To install this premium annex, simply simply pitch your awning as normal and use the built in zip to attach this annex onto the side of your awning, pump it up and peg! Set up couldn't be easier!

Part of the Westfield Premium Series, this awning features three-layer air tubes and a unique AAS System, with which the air awning is inflated at a single point, allowing a quick and easy setup. Utilising Hydrotech CottonTouch fabric with its anti-condensation performance, amazing weather resistance and UV stability, no other awning could compete. With user-friendly features, premium materials and advanced technology there is no other awning like this on the market.

Product Name: Adventurer (THC) Curved Frame Top Hung Hinged Low Profile Campervan Window - White Blind
Product Description:
Adventurer (THC) Curved Radius Frame Top Hinged Campervan Windows - White Blind

Black Aluminium Curved Frame Low Profile Campervan Window with White Blinds, ideal for panel vans.

The Adventurer THC Window comes with a black aluminium frame and white blinds. These Adventurer Curved Campervan Top Hung Windows are designed to seamlessly blend with the contours of your van. As many campervans and converted vans feature side walls with a slight curve running to the bottom, the THC matches the curve of your vans walls to fit perfectly.

These windows are practical and stylish. Featuring a sleek aluminium frame with high-quality, tinted double glazed UV resistant acrylic. This ensures both durability, privacy and protection against the suns UV rays. Available in various sizes to cater to your needs and the size of your campervan. The durable aluminium frame and stainless steel strut rods (with the exception of the 818 x 315mm model which comes with plastic struts) are designed for stability and performance, ensuring that your window has reliable a long lifespan. Featuring a tinted double glazed window and pleated blind and flyscreen within a PVC frame, the Adventurer Curved Frame low profile window ensures privacy when needed and helps to keep light out and adjust light levels. The flyscreen also helps to provide airflow yet keep bugs out.

Installation couldn't be easier! With a window mounting frame which follows the curvature of the campervan wall with a thickness of 25-40mm makes for easy installation on most vehicles and a wide range of window sizes in a stylish black colour will compliment most colour schemes well. It is suggested that a timber frame is bonded to the inside of the vehicle to add rigidity to the van's sides. The timber fame can be built up from thinner strips of ply to follow the curve of the campervan's sides.

Adventurer Curved Top Hung Hinged Windows Specifications

  • Aluminium alloy flat frame finished in black
  • Double glazed acrylic window
  • UV resistant
  • Vertical Curvature radius of 5000mm
  • Double stainless steel struts (with the exception of 818 x 315 frame)
  • Two handle closures
  • Pleated blind and fly screen with PVC frame
  • Wall thickness mounting size: 25-40mm frame
  • Suitable for caravan motorhome van conversion or campervan

Black Aluminium Curved Frame Low Profile Campervan Window with White Blinds, ideal for panel vans.

The Adventurer RND Curved Campervan Windows with Rounded Edge and Top Hinge come with a black frame and white blinds. Ideal for renovating your campervan, upgrading your windows or adding style to your vehicle. This Adventurer Window matches the curve of your vans bodyshell that most panel vans and campervans have due to a slight curve running top to bottom on the sides.

Featuring a premium high-quality frame with dark tinted double glazed UV resistant acrylic which ensures durability, privacy and sun protection. Available in various sizes to fit your van perfectly and cater to your needs. For added privacy, the Adventurer RND windows feature dark tinted double glazed windows with a pleated blind and a flyscreen within a PVC frame, helping to add privacy, keep the light out, and keep the bugs out of your camper.

The Adventurer RND window is an ideal campervan window that follows the curvature of your campervans sides, with a maximum thickness of 26-50mm for easy installation on most vehicles and a wide range of window sizes. Coming in a stylish black colour that compliments most caravan colour schemes to blend in seamlessly into your van. We suggest that a timber frame is bonded to the inside of the vehicle to add rigidity to the van's sides. The timber fame can be built up from thinner strips of ply to follow the curve of the campervan's sides.

Product Name: Mestic Motorhome Rooftop Air Conditioner RTA-1700L
Product Description:
Mestic Motorhome Rooftop Air Conditioner RTA-1700L

Create your ideal climate in your caravan or campervan with the Mestic Motorhome Rooftop Air Conditioner RTA-1700L. This versatile unit from Mestic not only cools but also heats, thanks to its integrated heat pump. You can effortlessly set your desired temperature between 16°C and 31°C.

Environmentally Friendly and Powerful Performance

The Mestic Motorhome Rooftop Air Conditioner RTA-1700L allows you to cool, heat, or ventilate your caravan or campervan. With a cooling capacity of 1700 W and a heating capacity of 1960 W, it's suitable for vehicles up to 7 metres long. Much of the housing is made from polypropylene, a robust and lightweight material. Its compact size means you'll have ample roof space remaining for a solar panel or roof box. This Mestic air conditioner uses R290 gas, an exceptionally eco-friendly and efficient refrigerant with a Global Warming Potential (GWP) of just 3, significantly lower than other refrigerants.

Key Benefits

  • Cools, heats, and ventilates
  • Cooling capacity: 1700 W
  • Heating capacity: 1960 W
  • Temperature range: 16 °C to 31 °C
  • Lightweight polypropylene housing
  • Adjustable airflow for left and right control
  • Installation dimensions: 39 x 39 cm (also possible from 40 x 40 cm)
  • Dimensions: 96 x 58.5 x 25.9 cm (L x W x H)

Customisable Comfort and Convenience

Want to keep your caravan or campervan cool while sleeping without a direct draught? With the Mestic Motorhome Rooftop Air Conditioner RTA-1700L, you can adjust the airflow separately for the left and right sides. You can also choose to use only the ventilation modes at night. The handy timer function lets you decide how long the air conditioner runs. If you're a light sleeper, you'll appreciate the sleep mode, which makes this already quiet Mestic air conditioner even quieter. For added ambience, it even features atmospheric LED lighting. All these functions can be easily controlled via the touchscreen display of the indoor unit, the included remote control, or your smartphone with the Mestic app.

The Mestic Motorhome Rooftop Air Conditioner RTA-1700L is available in both white and black versions. It truly offers complete control over your caravan, campervan or motorhome's climate!

Product Name: Westfield Kari Premium Sunroof Air Canopy for Caravan
Product Description:
Westfield Kari Premium Air Sunroof for Caravan

Inflatable Canopy Shelter

The Westfield Kari Premium Air Sunroof Canopy is a summer essential for your caravan. This inflatable air sunshade features an Advanced Air System for easy inflation and deflation with a single point of inflation that uses standard pumps for ease of use. Made from high-quality premium breathable Hydrotech cotton touch fabric for long lasting durability. This caravan sun shelter can be pitched in a matter of minutes by a single person, simply inflate using a standard pump.

Optional extras for this sunroof include two side walls to shelter your awning space from the wind, this is perfect for relaxing under the shade. A complete door front mesh is also available for this sunroof to transform your awning into a bug-free living area. This is recommended to be purchased alongside the canopy walls and the front window panel to create the perfect porch for your caravan. A full window panel is also available to provide an outside barrier between your awnings living space and the outer area. Protect the inside of your awning from wind and rain by creating an awning porch right outside of your caravan.

Part of the Westfield Premium Series, this awning features three-layer air tubes and a unique AAS System, with which the air awning is inflated at a single point, allowing a quick and easy setup. Utilising Hydrotech CottonTouch fabric with its anti-condensation performance, amazing weather resistance and UV stability, no other awning could compete. With user-friendly features, premium materials and advanced technology there is no other awning like this on the market.

Kari Sunroof Key Features:

  • Made from Hydrotech cotton touch fabric that can be used in any season
  • Breathable, anti-condensation non-fade fabric
  • Advanced Air System with single point of inflation
  • Premium performance air canopy
  • Built-in reflective storm straps with strap tidy pockets
  • Easy setup, can be pitched by a single person in minutes
  • Optional extras include side panels, front mesh panel, front window panel
  • Small pack size
  • Lightweight

Product Name: Westfield Ceres Air Caravan Full Awning
Product Description:
Westfield Ceres Premium Lite Caravan Air Full Awning

Inflatable Caravan Awning

The Westfield Ceres Caravan Air Awning is part of the Westfield Premium-Light Series. Available in different sizes including XS, S, M, L, XL, and XXL to allow you to find the right awning for your caravan. Made from HydroTech 150D Ripstop material, the Ceres awning creates a comfortable indoor space, with its continuous ventilation and tinted panoramic windows. Allowing you to stay cool even on warm summer days. Additional features including removable front and side panels with mosquito nettings provide airflow and privacy as needed, as well as zipped blinds on all windows for extra privacy when required.

Part of the Westfield Premium Light Series this awning features premium lighter weight materials whilst maintaining Westfield top-of-the-range performance. Simply a lighter selection, their light weight makes them easier to use without compromising on performance. Meaning this range is lighter, but will still last for years. Featuring an ultra-reliable AAS Advanced Air System and a high-quality next-generation lightweight Hydrotech® RipStop fabric which gives you the performance you would expect from a heavyweight fabric in a lightweight package.

Enhance your holiday experience by adding this premium awning to your caravan. Its curved frame and spacious interior creates a modern, stylish awning design that will make your caravan stand out against its neighbours. With fully opening windows, doors and service flaps, and a Kador that feeds completely around your vehicle, ensuring a secure, weatherproof seal against the wind and rain. Also featuring an advance air system for an easy and quick set up, allowing the whole awning to be inflated from a single point, you can inflate this awning in minutes! Taking down this awning couldn't be easier, with four deflation points to allow for a fast and effortless takedown.

Product Name: Westfield Mars Motorhome and Converted Van Inflatable Air Awning
Product Description:
Westfield Mars Air Awning for Panel Van, Converted Camper Van, Motorhome

Inflatable Porch Air Awning

The Westfield Mars Air Awning is an inflatable porch awning for a sliding door van and converted vans. Also suitable for caravans and motorhomes, this van awning offers a range of versatility. Part of the Westfield Premium Light Series this awning features premium lighter weight materials whilst maintaining Westfield top-of-the-range performance. Simply a lighter selection, their light weight makes them easier to use without compromising on performance. Meaning this range is lighter, but will still last for years. Featuring an ultra-reliable AAS Advanced Air System and a high-quality next-generation lightweight Hydrotech® RipStop fabric which gives you the performance you would expect from a heavyweight fabric in a lightweight package.

With an advanced air system (AAS) with a single point of inflation for an easy setup, allowing you to inflate this awning in no time! What's more, is an easy takedown to allow you to set off easily by deflating from four deflation points. Meaning you can take this awning down just as easy, handy for when you're on the move. The Mars Air Awning offers a spacious living area with plenty of room for camping chairs, a table, and attractive outdoor seating. The Westfield Mars is a versatile awning with front panels that can be used either as doors or removed completely for a walk-in open shelter, transforming this awning into a practical sunroof. This Westfield Awning features mosquito nets on the removeable side walls for ventilation, with extra-large windows with slightly tinted film to allow plenty of light into the awning. This awning is annex ready, meaning it can be expanded with the Eris premium living annex for an extended living space. 

Mars Awning Key Features:

  • Quick and easy setup
  • Lightweight, superior HydroTech® Ripstop material
  • Permanent ventilation through high vents
  • Double dirt strip
  • Side walls with tinted window film, door function, mosquito nets and privacy screen
  • Two front walls with tinted panoramic windows
  • Front wall elements feature privacy screen

Product Name: Dorema Starcamp Quick N Easy 265 MHA Air Campervan Driveaway Awning
Product Description:
Dorema Starcamp Quick N Easy 265 MHA Air Campervan Driveaway Awning

Built with premium Weathertex material, the Dorema Starcamp Quick N Easy 265 MHA Air Campervan Driveaway Awning is designed to endure all weather conditions. Its ultra-durable, PU-coated polyester fabric, with a 4000mm hydrostatic head rating, offers outstanding resistance against the elements and long-lasting durability. You can rest assured that the Dorema Starcamp Quick N Easy 265 MHA Air Campervan Driveaway Awning will stand up to whatever nature throws its way.

The Dorema Starcamp Quick N Easy 265 MHA Air Campervan Driveaway Awning comes with a versatile dual beading system. It features a 4mm beading for connection to wind-out canopy awnings, and a 6mm beading for direct attachment to the awning channel. This allows you to customize your setup, whether you're looking to expand your living area, add storage, or create a cosy sleeping space with the option of a freestanding inner tent.

Thanks to its internal roll-up privacy blinds on every window, you can easily create a private, peaceful retreat whenever needed with the Dorema Starcamp Quick N Easy 265 MHA Air Campervan Driveaway Awning. The side panels are also equipped with mesh ventilation doors, providing optimal airflow to keep the awning cool and fresh while keeping insects at bay.

Designed to seamlessly fit campervans and motorhomes, the Dorema Starcamp Quick N Easy 265 MHA Air Campervan Driveaway Awning comes in two sizes. The low awning is compatible with campervans between 180cm and 210cm in height. The tall attachment fits campervans ranging from 240cm to 270cm, making it a great choice for taller vehicles. The sleek charcoal/grey colour scheme adds a modern, stylish touch to your outdoor setup.

Weighing just 13kg, the Dorema Starcamp Quick N Easy 265 MHA Air Campervan Driveaway Awning is lightweight and portable, making it a convenient addition to your camping gear. Included storm buckles and straps offer extra security and peace of mind, even during severe weather.

Features:

  • Roof and wall material: Extra strong quality WeatherTex 150D PU coated, fire retardant polyester.
  • Clear view windows with privacy blinds
  • Sewn-in groundsheet
  • Front zip panel can be rolled up
  • Ventilation: Fly screen mesh in front panel and side-top quarter ventilation
  • Dual Beading: 4mm / 6mm for Fiamma/Thule Wind-Out Canopy attachment or awning rail attachment
  • Comes with vehicle throw over straps should your vehicle not feature a wind-out canopy or awning rail
  • Adjustable webbing straps on the tunnel (cowl)
  • Left and right side tunnel access door
  • High-visibility (fluorescent) guy ropes
  • High-volume manual pump included

Product Description:
Dorema Starcamp Tourer Full Caravan Awning

Experience effortless touring with the Dorema Starcamp Tourer Full Caravan Awning, the ideal choice for your short camping breaks. This Dorema awning offers an outstanding combination of value and quality, designed for convenience and durability.

Crafted with lightweight coated polyester walls and a robust roof, the Dorema Starcamp Tourer Full Caravan Awning is remarkably quick and easy to set up, leaving you more time to relax and enjoy your camping holiday. While light enough for easy transport, its resilient design ensures a reliable and sturdy shelter on your travels.

The Dorema Starcamp Tourer Full Caravan Awning comes with a strong 25mm steel frame, guaranteeing peace of mind with its stability and longevity. For added versatility, both side panels feature a door that can be completely unzipped and replaced with an optional annexe. This is perfect for creating extra storage space or, with an inner tent, providing comfortable sleeping quarters for guests on a camping trip.

With a generous depth of 240cm and available in a wide range of widths, you can find the perfect size to correspond with your caravan for a seamless fit. Choose the Dorema Starcamp Tourer Full Caravan Awning for simplicity, comfort, and adventure on all your camping journeys.

Product Name: Westfield Triton Campervan Motorhome Air Awning
Product Description:
Westfield Triton Drive Away Air Awning for Campervan and Motorhome

Lightweight Inflatable Awning

The Westfield Triton Drive Away Air Awning is part of the Westfield Premium Light Series. Suitable for campervan and motorhomes, this awning can also be setup independently from your van, ideal for camping holidays. Featuring an inflatable air frame with a single point of inflation for easy setup. Designed to be durable and light weight, this air awning is perfect for your campervan and motorhome holidays. Offering excellent shelter; waterproof, UV-resistant and weather protection, everything you expect from a premium Westfield awning. With three optional choices of connection tunnels to suit your vehicle. Choose between; low (180-210cm) for campervans, mid (210-240cm) for motorhomes and high (240-270cm) for motorhomes. 

The Triton awning also offers drive-away functionality, allowing you to easily disconnect your awning from your campervan or motorhome to leave your awning at your campsite. This is ideal to run errands or go sightseeing, leaving your awning freestanding without needing to disassemble it. The Westfield Triton air awning features an advance air system, with a single point of inflation, making it easy to set up with a standard pump. What's more, the Triton can be deflated from four valves for a quick and simple take down with little hassle.

Part of the Westfield Premium Light Series this awning features premium lighter weight materials whilst maintaining Westfield top-of-the-range performance. Simply a lighter selection, their light weight makes them easier to use without compromising on performance. Meaning this range is lighter, but will still last for years. Featuring an ultra-reliable AAS Advanced Air System and a high-quality next-generation lightweight Hydrotech® RipStop fabric which gives you the performance you would expect from a heavyweight fabric in a lightweight package.

Westfield Triton Key Features:

  • Lightweight
  • HydroTech Ripstop material
  • UV 50+ Protection
  • Advanced Air System (AAS)
  • Single or multiple points of inflation
  • Single person pitch
  • Anti-weather system
  • Internal blinds
  • Rain safe canopy
  • All four side panels can be removed to transform into an air shelter/gazebo

Product Name: Dorema Starcamp Quick N Easy Air Caravan Sunshade Canopy
Product Description:
Dorema Starcamp Quick N Easy Air Caravan Sunshade Canopy

Looking to upgrade your caravan setup? The Dorema Starcamp Quick N Easy Air Caravan Sunshade Canopy could be exactly what you're after. This Dorema Starcamp sun canopy offers both comfort and convenience, featuring robust WeatherTex walls and an air tube frame system that's incredibly easy to inflate. It's perfect for creating a comfortable outdoor space, shielding you from the sun's rays and keeping you relaxed all day on your next camping trip.

Effortless Setup and Robust Design

One of the standout features of the Dorema Starcamp Quick N Easy Air Caravan Sunshade Canopy is its straightforward setup. Thanks to its innovative air tube frame, you can inflate the canopy swiftly and without any fuss. Once inflated, it provides a stable and sturdy structure capable of withstanding various outdoor weather conditions, offering you reliable protection from wind, light rain, and other elements while camping.

Perfect Fit and Spacious Comfort

Designed to fit caravans with a height range of 235-250 cm, the Dorema Starcamp Quick N Easy Air Caravan Sunshade Canopy ensures a seamless and custom fit. Whether you're after shade from the sun or a cosy shelter during a light shower, the zip-out and roll-back side panels allow you to customise the canopy to your exact needs.

Lightweight and Secure for Any Outdoor Camping Adventure

The Dorema Starcamp Quick N Easy Air Caravan Sunshade Canopy is remarkably lightweight and portable, making it simple to transport and set up wherever your outdoor travels take you. For added peace of mind on your camping adventure, storm buckles and straps are included as standard, ensuring your canopy remains secure even in challenging weather.

Experience the delights of outdoor living with the Dorema Starcamp Quick N Easy Air Caravan Sunshade Canopy. It's an excellent way to enhance your camping setup, create a comfortable retreat, and make lasting memories with loved ones. Embrace the freedom and relaxation that comes with owning this reliable and stylish sun canopy.

In summary, the Dorema Starcamp Quick N Easy Air Caravan Sunshade Canopy is a fantastic addition to any caravan awning setup. With its blend of comfort, convenience, and durability, it promises many enjoyable days of comfortable camping and outdoor relaxation.

Product Description:
7kg Butane Calor Gas Bottles for Campervans, Caravans, Motorhomes, Boats, BBQs & Off-Grid Use

In Store and In Stock - Collection Only

We stock genuine Calor Gas bottles, the UK’s most trusted brand for portable LPG. Ideal for campervans, caravans, motorhomes, BBQs, patio heaters, and off-grid living. Whether you're starting fresh or looking to exchange an existing Calor bottle, we’ve got you covered in-store.

For information on buying new and exchanging your Calor gas bottle, see here. Please note that we do not accept bottle returns or repossessions. For more information, please call the store on 0151 334 0222.

Please give us a call to check availability - we're happy to help!

7kg Butane Gas Bottle

Ideal for powering smaller indoor heaters and handy for cooking, these medium gas bottles are a kitchen essential for your caravan or motorhome. Suitable for portable heaters and cooking appliances in your caravan and whilst camping. 

Please note: Butane freezes at -2°C and below. It is important to store butane gas bottles inside as temperatures begin to drop during the Autumn and Winter.

Usage

  • Portable heaters (indoor heaters)
  • Cooking and heating

Which regulator do I need?

  • 21mm clip on regulator

How to safely connect and disconnect gas bottles?

Before you connect:

  • You'll need a 21mm clip on regulator

Please note: You should never disconnect the regulator with the switch in the ON position

How to connect:

  • Make sure the regulator switch is in the OFF position
  • Place the regulator down onto the gas bottle valve and press downwards firmly until you hear the ‘click’. This indicates that the regulator is in place
  • Turn the gas on/off switch a quarter turn anticlockwise to the ON position to turn the gas on
  • Turn the switch clockwise to the OFF position after use, this is to turn the gas off

How to disconnect:

  • Make sure the regulator switch is in the OFF position
  • If the flame doesn’t go out, leave the appliance alight and contact the Calor gas emergency service number on 03457 444 999
  • Press the 'push' button on the lower part and lift the regulator from the valve
  • If you’re using a butane gas bottle, place the safety cap onto the empty bottle valve

Product Name: Calor Gas 6kg Propane Gas Bottle - Available for Collection Only
Product Description:
6kg Propane Calor Gas Bottles for Campervans, Caravans, Motorhomes, Boats, BBQs & Off-Grid Use

In Store and In Stock - Collection Only

We stock genuine Calor Gas bottles, the UK’s most trusted brand for portable LPG. Ideal for campervans, caravans, motorhomes, BBQs, patio heaters, and off-grid living. Whether you're starting fresh or looking to exchange an existing Calor bottle, we’ve got you covered in-store.

For information on buying new and exchanging your Calor gas bottle, see here. Please note that we do not accept bottle returns or repossessions. For more information, please call the store on 0151 334 0222.

Please give us a call to check availability - we're happy to help!

6kg Propane Gas Bottle

Useful for fueling a variety of camping equipment, with a low boiling point propane is a popular camping and caravanning gas supply for all year round. Use with heating and cooking in your caravan or motorhome and outdoor camping.

Usage

  • Camping appliances and tools
  • Heating & cooking in your caravan or motorhome

Which regulator do I need?

  • 37mbar screw on regulator

How to safely connect and disconnect gas bottles?

Before you connect:

  • Check your bullnose connection is clean and undamaged
  • Make sure you have the correct sized spanner

How to connect:

  • Turn the valve hand wheel OFF by turning it clockwise
  • Unscrew and remove the protective plug from the valve outlet
  • Check the bullnose connection on the regulator for any damage before connecting
  • Screw the hose anti-clockwise into the gas bottle
  • Make sure the gas bottle connection is tight! Make sure to use a suitable spanner for this
  • To use the gas, turn the valve hand wheel anti-clockwise

How to disconnect:

  • Turn the valve hand wheel OFF (rotate clockwise)
  • Except for multi-bottle installations with a changeover valve, turn off the gas tap if it’s fitted to the appliance. Wait until the burner and pilot lights have gone out
  • If the flame doesn’t go out, leave the appliance alight and contact the Calor gas emergency service number on 03457 444 999. For installations with a change-over valve, you only need to turn off the empty gas bottle
  • Use a spanner to remove the regulator by turning it left, do not remove the regulator with the bottle valve open
  • Replace the protective plug into the valve outlet

Use to fuel your outdoor heating to keep warm in the winter, or use on your large barbeques in the summer to feed the family. You'll need a 27mm clip-on regulator for a safe and easy connection. Product Description:
Quest Falcon Caravan Porch Awning

Part of the Quest Falcon Series, these porch awnings are suitable for caravans. Lightweight and easy to pitch, this range of awnings can easily be erected by a single person. This range contains both the Falcon Air awnings and poled awnings for both the ease of using air to inflate your awning, or for those looking for a non-air solution that gives you amazing value for money. The Falcon Air range feature high-quality QuestTec150 fabric designed for light weight without compromising on performance. With the latest generation coating to enable UV stability and a reliable waterproof rating of 6,000mm HH. The Falcon Poled range features lightweight QuestTech75 fabric which features a high waterproof rating of 6,000mm HH and provides protection against the sun with a UV rating of 50+. Available models in this range include the Falcon Pro Air, Falcon Poled, and the Falcon Base Air.

Falcon Pro Air

The Falcon Pro Air is a lightweight caravan air porch awning. This inflatable awning is available in four sizes to suit your caravan. With a high waterproof rating, light weight and easy setup, this is the perfect awning for your summer caravanning holidays. The Falcon Air range uses lightweight 150D material that is high-quality, high-performance and low price!

Featuring a Fast Air Technology (FAT) system with a single beam that only takes a minute to inflate and even less to deflate. The quick-inflating airbeam is extremely strong and reliable, held in place by a reinforced sleeve secured to the awning via a zipped sleeve extra stability. With extra features including included storm straps for added ground anchorage and protection from the wind, meaning purchasing extra accessories isn't necessary to protect this awning from the weather. Making this a perfect cost-effective awning solution for your caravan.

Falcon Pro Air Key Features

  • Fat Air Tech (FAT) system
  • Single inflation beam for quick inflation
  • Lightweight
  • Small pack size
  • Pump included
  • Draught skirt included
  • Internal blinds with full and half toggles
  • Three doors
  • Ventilation side doors
  • Permanent built-in ventilation
  • Rear draught pads
  • Storm straps included

Falcon Base Air

Perfect for use on Swift Basecamp caravans! With all the features of the Falcon Pro Air and designed to fit on the rear of a Swift Basecamp caravan, this quick-inflation air awning is ideal for anyone looking for a cost-effective performance awning, even on regular caravans.

Falcon Pro Poled

The Falcon Poled is a lightweight caravan awning. This porch awning is high on features and low on cost, featuring a quick-fit frame, QTech75Pro fabric, UV protection and a high waterproof rating. With roll up front panels, built-in blinds, and full mesh doors, this poled Falcon awning is ideal for sunny weekends and caravan holidays. With the ability to erect a front sun canopy when using the universal canopy pole kit (sold separately). The Falcon Pro is so easy to pitch that it can be done by a single person, with it's minimal quick-fit frame and light weight that makes it extremely easy to pitch and set up.

Falcon Pro Poled Key Features

  • Quick-Fit poled frame for easy installation
  • Adjustable frame to work on all uneven surfaces
  • Three doors
  • Full ventilation
  • Easy view guy lines
  • Crystal clear windows
  • Roll down blinds for privacy
  • Two-way mud wall can be used on the inside or outside
  • Small pack size
  • Lightweight
  • Single person pitch
  • Draft skirt included

Product Name: Dorema Starcamp Valor Full Air Caravan Awning
Product Description:
Dorema Starcamp Valor Caravan Full Air Awning

If you're after a caravan awning that balances strength, quality, and value, the Dorema Starcamp Valor Caravan Full Air Awning is an excellent choice for outdoor camping and touring enthusiasts. It's built from high-quality European touring-grade coated polyester, meaning it's tough enough for all sorts of weather while giving you a roomy extension to your caravan. Thanks to its Easy Air Frame (EAF) system, pitching the Dorema Starcamp Valor Caravan Full Air Awning is a breeze. A single valve gets it inflated quickly, and the multi-valve deflation makes packing it away just as simple.

Spacious and Adaptable Design, with a generous depth of 240 cm and available in sizes from 775 cm to 1125 cm, there's plenty of room for relaxing or storage in the Dorema Starcamp Valor Caravan Full Air Awning. The coated polyester roof and European All Season touring quality polyester side panels ensure superb durability and protection from the elements on your next outdoor camping and touring trip.

Both the side and front panels zip out completely, letting you transform the Dorema Starcamp Valor Caravan Full Air Awning into an open-air sun canopy. Plus, you can remove the side panels to attach an annex if you need extra space.

Comfort and Style:

The Dorema Starcamp Valor Caravan Full Air Awning has full mesh panels on both side sections for excellent airflow, keeping the interior fresh and comfortable. Its sleek charcoal and grey colour combination means it'll look great with a wide range of caravans. Each Dorema Starcamp Valor Caravan Full Air Awning comes with all the essentials: Alloy Canopy Poles, Draught Skirt, Wheel Arch Cover, Ladder Straps, Heavy Duty Nylon Pegs, and a handy carry bag. Weighing between approximately 31 kg (smallest size) and 46 kg (largest), it's manageable yet incredibly stable, ideal for outdoor camping and touring trips.

Your Go-To All-Season Caravan Air Awning

The Dorema Starcamp Valor Caravan Full Air Awning is ideal for all-season use, offering durability, convenience, and adaptability. Its clever design ensures an easy set-up and pack-down, making your outdoor camping and touring adventures more enjoyable and stress-free.

Valor Caravan Awning Includes:

  • Draught Skirt
  • Wheel Arch Cover
  • Ladder Straps
  • Heavy Duty Nylon Pegs
  • Carry Bag
  • Alloy Canopy Poles
  • Zippers: 4 slider Opti S80 in front panel 2 slider reversible block zip Kroko BB

  • Material Roof: Coated polyester on the inside
  • Material Sides: European All Season touring quality ployester

Product Name: Dorema Starcamp Discovery Air Drive Away Campervan Motorhome Awning
Product Description:
Dorema Starcamp Discovery Air Drive Away Campervan Motorhome Awning

The Dorema Starcamp Discovery Air Drive Away Campervan Motorhome Awning is the latest addition to the Dorema Starcamp collection for motorhomes this season. The Dorema Starcamp Discovery Air Drive Away Campervan Motorhome Awning is made with the latest lightweight polyester fabric, making it perfect for short breaks and camping holidays. Designed to be both practical and easy to use, the Dorema awning offers everything you need for a hassle-free camping experience.

The Dorema Starcamp Discovery Air Drive Away Campervan Motorhome Awning comes equipped with Easy Air Frame tubes. This system allows the awning to be set up and taken down in just minutes, giving you more time to relax and enjoy your camping holiday. The front panel of the awning can be zipped out, and offers two adjustable positions to suit your needs. Both side panels feature roll-back doors on the left and right-hand sides, while the rear panel is fitted with a door for easy access.

To ensure maximum comfort while camping, the Dorema Starcamp Discovery Air Drive Away Campervan Motorhome Awning includes mesh ventilation on the front panel, helping to maintain a comfortable temperature while keeping unwanted bugs out. This luxurious lightweight motorhome awning, equipped with the Easy Air Frame System (EAF), is not only easy to erect in minutes but can also be used as a freestanding awning.

The Dorema Starcamp Discovery Air Drive Away Campervan Motorhome Awning is incredibly versatile and attaches to motorhomes using a zipper in the tunnel, fitting most motorhomes. It is perfect for short or long camping breaks, providing ample space and comfort for the whole family.

  • Side panels: Both panels can be rolled back.
  • Rear Panel: Can be rolled up or rolled back to create a door on either side.
  • Tunnel: Detachable fully zipped tunnel.
  • Ventilation: Front panel has full zipped window fly screen and mesh strip above the window.

Product Description:
Dorema Diamond XL Deluxe Full Caravan Awning

Need extra room on your outdoor camping and touring adventures? The Dorema Diamond XL Deluxe Full Caravan Awning offers a generous depth, from 270cm to 300cm. It's perfectly suited for both seasonal pitching and touring, meaning you get reliable performance all year round.

The roof of the Dorema Diamond XL Deluxe Full Caravan Awning is crafted from durable TenCate All Season coated polyester, featuring a smart printed pattern on the inside for a touch of interior style. The side panels are made from high-quality Sattler Acrylic with a super-soft finish, creating both outdoor longevity and a premium feel.

For ultimate flexibility, the front and side panels of the Dorema Diamond XL Deluxe Full Caravan Awning are fully zippable and can be rolled down or completely removed. You'll also find part fly screens on the side panels, providing excellent ventilation while keeping insects out, ensuring relaxation on your next outdoor camping or touring trip.

A handy removable Velcro mud wall helps to keep your Dorema Diamond XL Deluxe Full Caravan Awning pristine.

Presented in a sophisticated charcoal and grey colour scheme, the Dorema Diamond XL Deluxe Full Caravan Awning is a spacious, stylish, and top-quality solution for any caravanner seeking that extra bit of depth on their outdoor camping and touring adventures. It truly combines practicality with elegance, making it an ideal addition to your caravan setup and a great product for outdoor camping and touring trips.

Product Description:
Dorema Monza 240 Caravan Full Awning

Looking for an awning that's both elegant and practical for outdoor camping and touring? The Dorema Monza 240 Caravan Full Awning is a superb choice, designed to offer exceptional comfort and resilience whether you're on a seasonal pitch or touring. With a generous 240cm depth, there's plenty of room for relaxing and storing your gear.

The Dorema Monza 240 Caravan Full Awning is built to last, crafted from TenCate All Season coated polyester for both the roof and side panels. This robust, weather-resistant material ensures reliable performance in all sorts of outdoor conditions, guaranteeing a safe and relaxing outdoor camping or touring adventure.

The front panel of the Dorema Monza 240 Caravan Full Awning features two doors that can be rolled down or completely zipped out, giving you flexible access and usage. All zips are strong 10 mm YYK for a secure and durable closure. The side panels also have doors and can be fully removed if desired, each including a part fly screen to boost ventilation and keep those pesky insects out.

Frame Options

The Dorema Monza 240 Caravan Full Awning comes with a 25mm EasyGrip steel frame as standard. However, you can upgrade to a more robust 28 mm steel frame or opt for the lightweight FibreTech Plus EasyGrip frame. Just a heads-up: the FibreTech frame isn't recommended for seasonal pitches, so pick the frame that best suits your outdoor camping and touring needs.

Finished in an attractive charcoal and grey colour scheme, the Dorema Monza 240 Caravan Full Awning is a stylish and highly functional option for both outdoor camping and touring. It's an excellent choice for any caravanner seeking a dependable awning for both extended stays and short camping trips.

Specification

  • Depth: 240cm
  • Combined weight (canvas + standard frame): Size 8 = 33kg, Size 19 = 48kg
  • Colour: Charcoal and grey
  • Frame:25mm EasyGrip steel, includes Canopy Poles
  • Material Roof: TenCate All Season coated polyester
  • Material Sides: TenCate All Season coated polyester
  • Frontpanel: Both front panels are fitted with a door and can be rolled down or zipped out
  • Sidepanels: Both panels are fitted with a door and can be zipped out. Part fly screen fitted to both side panels
  • Privacy Blinds: External zipped privacy blinds fitted to 240 De Luxe model only
  • Zippers: Extra strong YYK zippers (10mm)
  • Brand: Dorema
  • Warranty: 1 Year
  • Anwing usage: Touring and seasonal
  • Model: Monza 240

 

Determine the correct awning size

Measure your caravan through the awning rail from ground to ground (A to B to C) as shown in the diagram below and compare your measurement with the measurements in the table. The Dorema awning size required will be the range that has your measurement in it.

SEASONAL CARAVANNERS PLEASE NOTE

Dorema strongly recommend that anyone seasonally siting their awning should measure the caravan on the seasonal pitch prior to ordering their awning, (for example, a pitch with decking could alter the awning size required).

Product Name: Dorema Monza 240 Deluxe Full Caravan Awning
Product Description:
Dorema Monza 240 Deluxe Full Caravan Awning

If you're looking for an awning that combines practicality for outdoor camping and touring with a touch of luxury, the Dorema Monza 240 Deluxe Full Caravan Awning is an excellent choice. It has all the great features of the standard Dorema Monza 240 caravan awning, but with enhanced privacy and comfort options.

Key Features

Just like the original, the Dorema Monza 240 Deluxe Full Caravan Awning is constructed from TenCate All Season coated polyester, making it robust enough for both seasonal pitches and touring adventures, no matter the weather. With a generous depth of 240 cm, you'll have plenty of space for living and camping, and its stylish charcoal and grey design will look fantastic with any caravan.

One of the standout features in the Dorema Monza 240 Deluxe Full Caravan Awning is the inclusion of external zipped privacy blinds, giving you an extra layer of seclusion whenever you need it. Both the front and side panels feature extra-strong 10 mm YYK zips for secure closure. Similar to the standard model, the front panel offers two doors that can be rolled down or completely zipped out, while the side panels are removable and include a part fly screen to keep insects out while allowing fresh air to circulate.

Frame Options

You have a choice of three frame options to suit your outdoor camping and touring needs:

  • Standard 25mm EasyGrip steel frame
  • More robust 28mm steel version
  • Lighter, more flexible FibreTech Plus EasyGrip frame (Please note: the FibreTech frame is not suitable for seasonal site use)

The Dorema Monza 240 Deluxe Full Caravan Awning is truly ideal for campers who desire the full functionality of the Dorema Monza 240, along with those added touches of privacy and comfort for outdoor camping and touring.

Product Name: Quest Eagle Air/Poled Drive Away Awning
Product Description:
Quest Eagle Air & Poled Drive Away Awning for Campervan and Motorhome

Part of the Quest Falcon Series, these porch awnings are suitable for campervans and motorhomes. Lightweight and easy to pitch, this range of awnings can easily be erected by a single person. This range contains both the Falcon Air awnings and poled awnings for both the ease of using air to inflate your awning, or for those looking for a non-air solution that gives you amazing value for money. The Air range feature high-quality QuestTec150 fabric designed for light weight without compromising on performance. With the latest generation coating to enable UV stability and a reliable waterproof rating of 6,000mm HH. The Poled range features lightweight QuestTech75 fabric which features a high waterproof rating of 6,000mm HH and provides protection against the sun with a UV rating of 50+. Available models in this range include the Eagle Air, Eagle Poled, and the optional Eagle Annex.

Eagle Air and Eagle Poled Drive Away Awning

Available in both an Air model and a Poled model, the Eagle Awning range has been designed to fit motorhomes and campervans with a height range or 180cm - 210cm (low) or 240cm - 270cm (high). This lightweight awning can be used as an ideal living space to expand the area of your motorhome, or as a freestanding tent that acts as a base on your campsite, simply detach the awning from your motorhome or campervan to save disassembling your space when using your vehicle. This makes your holiday easier as you can just leave the Eagle tent at your site to run errands or drive to the beach!

Eagle Poled Annex

An optional poled annex is compatible with all models in the Eagle drive away range. Use this annex to expand the living area in your awning. Simply setup and pitch using the built-in door zips to attach to your awning. Ideal as an additional bedroom, cooking area or storage space.

Eagle Drive Away Awning Key Features

  • Lightweight, quick drying, durable fabric
  • Air awning features Fast Air Tech (FAT) system
  • Poled awning features Quick-Fit poles for easy pitching
  • Five doors
  • Permanent built-in ventilation
  • Rain-safe canopy over side door
  • Built-in fully tubbed groundsheet for added weather protection
  • Easy view guy lines
  • UV coating for U.P.F rating of 50+ for protection against the sun
  • Crystal clear windows with internal blinds for amazing views and full privacy
  • Packs away to small size for easy transport and storage
  • Easy to pitch, can be done by a single person in a matter of minutes

Product Name: Fogstar Eco Drift LifePo4 Lithium Leisure Battery - 100AH
Product Description:
Fogstar Eco Drift 100Ah Lithium LiFePO4 Leisure Battery

Reliable, Affordable Off-Grid Power For Campervans Caravans Motorhomes and Marine

The Fogstar Eco Drift 100Ah Lithium Battery is your ideal 12V power solution for campervans, caravans, motorhomes, boats, and off-grid systems. Offering 100Ah capacity and 1250Wh of usable energy, it’s perfect for powering your 12V appliances, providing dependable and long-lasting performance.

Lithium batteries, like the Fogstar Eco Drift, offer significant advantages over traditional wet lead batteries. They provide higher efficiency, deliver more usable power, and last longer—up to 10 years. With fewer maintenance requirements and a compact design, lithium batteries free up space in your campervan, caravan, or boat while ensuring reliable off-grid performance.

Key Features:

  • Reliable & Efficient: Powers demanding 12V appliances with ease, ideal for extended off-grid use.
  • Built to Last: 3000 cycles at 80% DoD, ensuring a 10-year lifespan with proper care.
  • Safe & Secure: Advanced 100A Battery Management System (BMS) protects against overvoltage, undervoltage, and temperature extremes.
  • Lightweight & Durable: Compact, rugged IP67 housing, and only 10kg for easy integration into any setup.
  • Affordable: Budget-friendly lithium battery with an industry-leading 6-year warranty.

Whether for leisure, solar storage, or off-grid power, the Fogstar Eco Drift 100Ah offers efficient, long-lasting, and safe energy for all your adventures.

Product Description:
Fiamma Motor Kit Advanced for F45s Awning

Genuine Fiamma Upgrade Part

The Fiamma Motor Kit Advanced is a genuine Fiamma part used to upgrade your awning. This motor kit is available in three colours; White, Deep Black and Titanium to match awning. Compatible with the Fiamma App (Android or iOS) or the included wall mounted switch control system to open and close your awning easily. Additionally, you can control the brightness of the awnings LED light with the dimming switch on the app. Download the Fiamma App (for Android or iOS) to control awning motor kit system and control LED lighting.

This motor kit replaces the winding handle included with the Fiamma F45s awning. Rather than using the Fiamma winding handle, which takes up time and effort to manually wind-out, upgrade to easily control the opening and closing of your awning in no time! Suitable for F45s awning for campervan, caravan, motorhome or converted van.

Product Name: Quest Kestral Air/Poled Drive Away Tailgate Awning for Campervan
Product Description:
Quest Kestral Air & Poled Drive Away Tailgate Awning

Part of the Quest Falcon Series, these porch awnings are suitable for campervans and motorhomes. Lightweight and easy to pitch, this range of awnings can easily be erected by a single person. This range contains both the Falcon Air awnings and poled awnings for both the ease of using air to inflate your awning, or for those looking for a non-air solution that gives you amazing value for money. The Air range feature high-quality QuestTec150 fabric designed for light weight without compromising on performance. With the latest generation coating to enable UV stability and a reliable waterproof rating of 6,000mm HH. The Poled range features lightweight QuestTech75 fabric which features a high waterproof rating of 5,000mm HH and provides protection against the sun with a UV rating of 50+. Available models in this range include the Kestral Air and the Kestral Poled.

Kestral Air and Kestral Poled Campervan Tailgate Awning

Suitable for campervans, these lightweight tailgate awnings can be used as a freestanding tent. Allowing you to leave your camping setup at your campsite while to run errands or go on trips in your campervan. Ideal for summer holidays and beach trips! With a high waterproof rating of 6,000mm HH you can ensure you'll stay fully dry, even in the worst of weather. With a compact pack size and its light weight, this awning is perfect for travel. A cost effective, lightweight tailgate campervan awning, perfect for summer holidays, camping trips and long journeys, suitable and compatible with you your VW T5, T6, or T6.1 campervan.

Kestral Drive-Away Tailgate Awning Key Features

  • Constructed from lightweight, quick-drying and durable QTech150 pro and QTech75 pro fabric
  • Air awning features Fast Air Tec (FAT) air system
  • Poled awning features Quick-Fit poles for easy pitching
  • Five doors
  • Built-in ventilation for airflow and reduced condensation
  • Included canopy pole kit for roll-up door or side panels to create as a sun canopy
  • Air awning features fully tubbed groundsheet for added weather protection, includes additional groundsheet for connection tunnel
  • Poled awning features removable clip in groundsheet for added weather protection
  • Easy view guy lines
  • UV coating for U.P.F rating of 50+ for protection against the sun
  • Crystal clear windows with internal blinds for amazing views and full privacy
  • Tailgate opens up into the connection tunnel
  • Easy to set up, can be pitched by a single person

It also has elastic straps to stop mattresses sliding off in the night.

Product Description:
Outwell Dreamboat Self Inflating Mattress for Camping

7.5cm Single and Double Sleeping Mat

The Outwell Dreamboat Self Inflating Sleeping Mattress is available in both single and double sizes. With a thickness of 7.5cm relax in comfort thanks to this luxury sleeping mat. Featuring a FHF (Flat High-Flow) valve for increased air flow when inflating and deflating. Additionally, this sleeping mat has vertical side static fabric panels that do not bend under pressure, this helps inflation as less air is required to be pumped. Thanks to the Flat High-flow Valve, deflation is rapid when packing away, meaning you can easily pack up your camping setup with no struggle! Also compatible with electric pumps for an even fast inflation! Super comfortable camping sleeping mat for a great sleep, even on the toughest ground.

Dreamboat Sleeping Mat Key Features

  • Unique heat regulating foam construction for optimum year-round comfort
  • Flat High-Flow valve for enhanced air flow
  • Extra large foam cavities for enhanced foam comfort
  • Reduced pack size and weight
  • 3D shape with deep profile for comfort
  • Ultra tough stretch polyester with soft-on-skin technology
  • Carry bag for easy storage and portability
  • Delamination-proof TPU durable construction 
  • Static side fabric for better 3D shape and easy inflation
  • PFAS free

Product Name: Quest Kite Tailgate Campervan Poled Awning
Product Description:
Quest Kite Tailgate Campervan Poled Awning 

Part of the Quest Falcon Series, these porch awnings are suitable for campervans and motorhomes. Lightweight and easy to pitch, this range of awnings can easily be erected by a single person. This range contains both the Falcon Air awnings and poled awnings for both the ease of using air to inflate your awning, or for those looking for a non-air solution that gives you amazing value for money. The Air range feature high-quality QuestTec150 fabric designed for light weight without compromising on performance. With the latest generation coating to enable UV stability and a reliable waterproof rating of 6,000mm HH. The Poled range features lightweight QuestTech75 fabric which features a high waterproof rating of 5,000mm HH and provides protection against the sun with a UV rating of 50+. Available models in this range include the Kite Tailgate Awning.

Tailgate Awning for VW T5, T5.1, T6, T6.1

The Quest Kite Tailgate Campervan Awning is a great choice for outdoor adventures. Reliable and versatile, this tailgate awning connects directly to the back of your VW camper. Designed to be setup by a single person for an effortless, quick and easy pitch, making it a stress-free addition to any trip. The Quest Kite tailgate awning is lightweight, compact, and easy to put away, ensuring convenience on the go. It's quick-drying, yet waterproof with a rating of 3,000mm HH, making this awning perfect for long road trips by the sea, come rain or shine.

Designed for use with Volkswagen T5, T5.1, T6, T6.1 models with tailgates. Also compatible with other models, may fit and be used with similar style vans if the tailgate matches that of the VW modes.

Key Features

  • Featuring lightweight, quick drying QTech75 pro fabric
  • Easy to pitch, can be done by a single person
  • Three doors
  • Roll up front door, can be used as an additional sun canopy
  • Clip in, fully tubbed groundsheet for extra weather protection
  • Easy view guy lines
  • UV coating for UPF 50+ sun protection
  • Crystal clear windows with internal blinds for great views and added privacy
  • Packs away into compact size for travel and storage 
  • Tailgate opens up into the awning
  • Compatible with VW T5, T5.1, T6, T6.1
Product Warranty: 1 Year Warranty on Falcon Series Awnings

Product Name: Quest Osprey Campervan Tailgate Sun Canopy
Product Description:
Quest Osprey Campervan Tailgate Sun Canopy

Part of the Quest Falcon Series, these porch awnings are suitable for campervans and motorhomes. Lightweight and easy to pitch, this range of awnings can easily be erected by a single person. This range contains both the Falcon Air awnings and poled awnings for both the ease of using air to inflate your awning, or for those looking for a non-air solution that gives you amazing value for money. Available models in this range include the Osprey Tailgate Sun Canopy.

Campervan Rear Sun Shade

The Quest Osprey Tailgate Sun Canopy for Campervans is an ideal solution for quick and easy shade on the go. Suitable for VW T5, T5.1, T6, T6.1, this sun canopy is lightweight and hassle free to set up. Simply attach over the barn doors of your campervan, no pegs required! An effective option for adding shelter whenever needed.

The Osprey Campervan Sun Canopy provides excellent sun protection, with a UV rating of 50+, you can expect highly effective, long-lasting performance. Featuring lightweight QTec300 Pro fabric for durability and waterproofing, high-performance is ensured, thanks to the durable 150D polyester with a 6,000mm HH waterproof rating for protection against the weather. Great for anyone looking for a stylish solution, wanting to enjoy the outdoors with minimal effort, the Osprey Campervan Tailgate Sun Canopy delivers convenience and protection on every adventure.

Osprey Canopy Key Features:

  • Instant canopy over the rear of your camper van
  • Lightweight premium QTec300 Pro fabric
  • Pole included to lock barn doors open and tighten the canopy
  • UV coating for high sun protection 50+ U.P.F rating
  • Compact size for easy storage and transport
  • Suitable for VW campervans T5, T5.1, T6, T6.1 with rear barn doors
  • Fits and clips into place, no pegs required!

Dometic Spare - Glass Dome Replacement for Mini Heki Style Rooflight

Replacement Glass Cover for Mini Heki Rooflight

Available in two options, with seal for no ventilation and without seal for added ventilation. For use as a replacement or spare part if you suspect your existing roof dome is broken or faulty.

The 400mm x 400mm Dometic Seitz roof vent dome for caravans, campervans and motorhome with fixed ventilation to prevent condensation buildup offers continuous airflow even when closed. Ideal for motorhome and campervan owners wanting to travel with reduced whistling noise and ventilation.

Product Name: SkyPod Lair Luxury Hard Case Roof Top Tent
Product Description:
SkyPod Lair Luxury Hard Case Roof Top Tent

Campervan Rooftop Tent

The SkyPod Lair is a premium hard top roof tent designed to fit campervans, any 4x4 vehicle, and a large number of SUV's, trailers and cars. This tent is designed for style and comfort, with multiple windows for amazing 360-degree panoramic views and an airy, well-ventilated space that is perfect for outdoor travel and camping adventures.

With an easy setup, you can get your rooftop tent up and running in minutes, no more long-winded pitching which take time and effort. Simply park your camper and easily set up your Lair SkyPod. This campervan tent can hold 2-4 people, perfect for your family. Crafted from durable material, this roof top tent can withstand all kinds of weather, making it perfect for travel all year round.

SkyPod Lair Key Features

  • Easy to setup and fold down thanks to its enhanced gas strut mechanism
  • Featuring a black hard shell with a textured surface to reduce wind noise whilst driving
  • Built-in track frame for additional flexibility for mounting solar lights or an awning
  • Two aluminium roof bars that can hold up to 100kg of cargo on top
  • Suitable for 2-4 people
  • Detachable LED strip (batteries not included)
  • 7cm high-density mattress for comfortable sleeping experience
  • Included telescopic aluminium alloy ladder that can hold up to 150kg

Product Name: SkyPod Rapide Premium Soft Top Roof Top Tent
Product Description:
SkyPod Rapide Premium Soft Top Roof Top Tent

Camper Rooftop Tent

The SkyPod Rapide is a luxury soft top roof tent designed to fit your campervan, 4x4 vehicle, and a large number of SUV's, trailers and cars. Designed for a quick and effortless setup, this premium roof top tent is perfect for those looking for an enhanced camping experience with comfort and style. Featuring a built-in gas strut mechanism to allow you to set it up or fold it down easily. Simply by fixing or releasing the strap, your Rapide roof tent can be ready to go in no time. This campervan roof tent is resistant to various weather conditions, so you can ensure you'll stay sheltered regardless of wind, rain or shine. Its soft shell has a PVC cover for protection against all weather, and is 100% waterproof to ensure you remain dry.

The SkyPod Rapide softshell car roof tent is lightweight and highly economical. With a light weight of only 56kg, this roof tent is suitable for 4x4 vehicles and also smaller vehicles, perfect for installing to the top of your car! Its gas-strut assisted designed makes the SkyPod Rapide compact enough to be barely noticeable on your car. Featuring a telescopic ladder that can extend up to 2.3m in length. With a built-in canopy for additional rain protection, this canopy can also keep the sun off you if it's too hot. This premium roof tent also features a 5cm mattress with an additional 5cm of EPE foam to ensure you have a good nights sleep. It has 3 doors for easy access, a removable back wall and floor and a full seam tape for water resistance. There are also 2 shoe pockets on the outside of the tent for additional storage.

Key Features

  • Easy setup
  • Weather protection
  • Can fit up to 2-3 people
  • Comfortable sleep ensured, included mattress that can be left inside your tent even when packed down
  • Detachable LED strip
  • Wind rating of Class 7 - up to 26MPH
  • Included mounting kit
  • Annex ready - compatible with the SkyPod Annex

Product Name: Dorema Starcamp Voyager Air Inflatable Campervan Motorhome Awning
Product Description:
Dorema Starcamp Voyager Air Inflatable Campervan Motorhome Awning

The Dorema Starcamp Voyager Air Inflatable Campervan Motorhome Awning is a versatile choice for campervan and motorhome owners who like outdoor camping, available in three sizes to suit vehicles with a height of 180cm to 300cm.

Adaptable Design & Premium Materials

The Dorema Starcamp Voyager Air Inflatable Campervan Motorhome Awning has a clever zip-out front panel that offers excellent flexibility to fit your outdoor camping needs: slide it forward for an expanded living area, or position it further back to create a sheltered porch. Crafted from durable 150D WeatherTex material, both the roof and walls of the Dorema Starcamp Voyager Air Inflatable Campervan Motorhome Awning are presented in a stylish charcoal and grey colour scheme.

Quick Pitch & Comfortable Living

Thanks to its multi-valve air tube system, this inflatable Dorema Starcamp awning inflates rapidly, getting you set up in no time for your camping holiday. Large windows provide a clear view of your surroundings, and internal privacy blinds are fitted to all windows. Thoughtful ventilation via the front and rear annex panels ensures a fresh, airy interior and helps minimise condensation in the Dorema Starcamp Voyager Air Inflatable Campervan Motorhome Awning.

Lightweight & Complete Setup

Weighing approximately 20kg, Dorema Starcamp Voyager Air Inflatable Campervan Motorhome Awning is lightweight for easy transport. For added comfort, a standard roof lining is included, and the fitted groundsheet comes with a convenient zip-in extension to complete your outdoor setup.

Specifications

  • Sizes: 180 to 300 cm
  • Tunnel beading length: 200 cm
  • Tunnel depth: 90 cm
  • Floor size: 300 cm x 420 cm
  • Frame: Multi Valve Air Tube System
  • Colour: Charcoal / Grey
  • Roof and wall material: 150D WeatherTex
  • Weight: Awning 20 kg (approx.)
  • Privacy Blinds: fitted internally to all windows
  • Front panel: can be zipped out, and moved forward to extend space
  • Ventilation: in front panel and rear annex panel Standard roof lining (awning only) and fitted groundsheet with zip-in extension
Product Availability: #Delivery 3 - 5 working days!
