Product Description:
SkyPod Annexe for SkyPod Lair & Rapide Roof Top Tent

Annexe Extension Tent

The SkyPod Annexe is an ideal tent expansion for your SkyPod roof top tent. Perfect for family holidays and for those wanting a versatile, spacious living area that will easily connect to your SkyPod Lair or SkyPod Rapide with no hassle. Designed as a weather-resistant extension to your camper, with a quick and easy setup to provide you with additional space for lounging, dining, storage or sleeping. Featuring three doors for easy access, an optional back wall for added privacy, a removable floor for easy cleaning and full seam taping for water resistance.

This tent will fit vehicles with roof heights of anywhere between 170cm and 225cm high. The SkyPod Annexe is designed to fit around the door of your SkyPod and extends down to the floor, perfect when you need extra space! Use this additional room as a sleeping area, for dining, storage or relaxing! Featuring a UPF of 50+ to keep you protected in the sun. Its robust aluminium frame allows you to erect this annexe in in seconds! A practical solution for expanding your camping space, making your SkyPod even more comfortable and luxurious!

SkyPod Annexe Key Features

  • Easy setup
  • Three doors for easy entrance
  • Fits vehicle heights between 170-225cm
  • Multifunctional design
  • Full seam tape for water resistance
  • Optional back wall and removable floor
  • Extra living space

Premium Camping Chair

The Quest Elite Bliss Relax Folding Chair is a luxury camping chair with a hammock-style seat for ultimate comfort. This portable camping chair has added levels of padding for extra comfort, giving you that sink-in feeling of quality and comfort. Then wrap the seat around the frame and use the carry bag to store both the frame and the seat. The included carry bag uses a shoulder strap for easy transport.

The Bliss has a unique design and a sleek grey finish that blends well with outdoor settings. The intuitive folding mechanism is designed for extra convenience, meaning you'll spend less time assembling this chair, and more time enjoying the outdoors. Ideal for camping, caravan holidays, campervan & motorhome trips and more!

Alpicool Adventurer Dual Compartment 12V Compressor Camping Caravan Compressor Coolbox

Product Description:
Victron Energy SuperPack Lithium 200Ah 12V Leisure Battery

Campervan, Caravan & Motorhome Off-Grid Power

The Victron Lithium SuperPack Leisure Battery is now available as a 200Ah model. Unleash off-grid freedom in your campervan, caravan or motorhome with this ideal leisure battery for all your outdoor adventures. Able to power you boat, campervan, motorhome or caravan to allow you to travel anywhere giving you ultimate freedom.

Built-in Safety & Easy Installation

With a built-in Battery Management System (BMS) and safety switch, with features to automatically disconnect the battery in case of over-charge, over-discharge, overheating and low temperatures to protect your battery and equipment. No additional components are needed are needed to setup, so installation couldn't be easier. The Victron SuperPack Battery connects easily in parallel configurations, perfect for increasing total amp-hours, but must not be connected in series.

Abuse Proof

Traditional lead-acid batteries can fail prematurely when used improperly, especially when left partially charged or frequently discharged without being fully charged. This can cause sulfation, a battery-killing issue that can drastically shorten its lifespan.

Lithium batteries however, are abuse-resistant. They're designed to handle irregular charging, operate efficiently in partial state of charge, and can be deeply discharged without long-term damage. This makes them ideal for off-grid setups, campervan energy systems, and remote application where full recharges aren't always possible. SuperPack batteries will cut-off the charge or discharge current when the maximum ratings are exceeded.

Efficient

Energy efficiency is crucial, especially in off-grid systems. The round-trip energy efficiency (discharge from 100% to 0% and back to 100% charged) of the average lead-acid battery is 80%. The round-trip energy efficiency of a Li-ion battery is 92%. The charge process of lead-acid batteries becomes particularly inefficient when the 80% state of change has been reached, resulting in efficiencies of 50% or even less in solar systems where several days of reserve energy are required (battery operating in 70% to 100% charged state). In contrast, Li-ion battery will still achieve 90% efficiency even under shallow discharge conditions.

Product Name: Vision Plus STATUS 270 Combi WiFi & TV Antenna + 4G/5G Router
Option Set: Vision Plus STATUS 270 Combi WiFi & TV Antenna + 4G/5G Router
Product Description:
Vision Plus STATUS 270 WiFi & TV Antenna + 4G/5G WiFi Router

Omni-Directional TV and 5G WiFi Antenna with 4G/5G Router

The Vision Plus STATUS 270 comes available in different colours and specifications. Available in black or white, with an optional added TV omni-directional TV antenna. All antennas are 5G as standard, with the option to come complete with a 4G Cat 6 or 5G Cat 22 router. Designed with a narrow, streamlined mounting foot for installation onto converted vans, motorhomes and campervans.

Integrated 4G/5G WiFi Router

The 4G Cat 6 or 5G Cat 22 WiFi router can be installed easily. Using a unique Power Base to install in a suitable locker powered by 12-24V. To charge their internal batteries, the router securely clips onto the Power Base. Once mounted, the STATUS WiFi antenna is then connected to maximise WiFi reception performance. The4G/5G router comes unlocked to accept any SIM and is highly portable to provide excellent connection wherever you go.

STATUS 270 Key Features:

  • 5G WiFi antenna with 4G or 5G WiFi Router
  • Combi model features omni-directional TV antenna (optional)
  • Omni-directional TV antenna receives horizontal and vertical TV signals through 360 degrees
  • Aerodynamic profile & lightweight design
  • Narrow, streamlined mounting foot
  • Easy and simple installation
  • On-screen display for ease of use
  • Portable

3 Year Warranty on Vision Plus Antennas
1 Year Warranty on Battery

Product Description:
Fiamma Compact Motor Kit for F45s Campervan, Caravan & Motorhome Awning

Automatic Wind Out Motor

Available in Polar White, Deep Black and Titanium to match the colour of your Fiamma F45s awning, the Fiamma F45s Compact Motor Kit is an ideal solution for your campervans awning. Used to automatically wind out your awning with the touch of a button. The Fiamma F45s Compact Motor Kit extends the length of your awning by approximately 13cm. Please note, this motor kit is not suitable for Fiamma ZIP awnings.

Easy Operation

A wall mounted control is included for an easy installation and ease of use. This kit can be installed even after it has been fitted on your vehicle. Once installed, full control is enabled over the motorised operation of the awning. Simply use the wall mounted control system to open and close your awning, manually opening and closing the awning can also be done in override mode.

Product Name: Kampa Sprint AIR Drive-Away Campervan Awning
Product Description:
Kampa Sprint AIR Campervan Drive-Away Awning

Inflatable Awning Tent for VW T5, T6 & similar sized campervans

The Kampa Sprint AIR Drive-Away Awning is the perfect addition to your campervan. This inflatable awning is the perfect connection height for your Volkswagen Transporter Campervan, suitable for VW T5, T6 and more! Thanks to its multi-point inflation system and durable AIR poles, you can set it up in minutes and pack it away just as easily. Featuring a built-in front canopy with a fibreglass pole to protect the main entrance from rainy weather and mesh doors to create a breeze whilst keeping out unwanted insects. With large windows on easier side, the Sprint AIR allows natural light to come into your space. Upgrade your campervans living area with the Sprint AIR Drive-Away Awning, use it as an extra bedroom, additional storage or as a dining area. Perfect for a weekend away and a VW road trip!

Sprint AIR Key Features

  • Lightweight and compact for easy transport and storage
  • Adjustable connection height to fit lower vehicles
  • Front canopy allows main door to stay open in wet weather
  • Pole-free, inflatable frame structure
  • Drop-down entrance for easy access, suitable for pushchair
  • Hot air taped seams for maximum weatherproofing
  • Side door in connection tunnel for easy access
  • Dual Kador 4mm and 6mm for campervan and motorhome cassette awnings and awning rail
  • Comes complete with peg pack, carry bag and hand pump

Tailgate Bike Rack for Volkswagen T5 Van

The Fiamma Carry-Bike VW T5 has been designed specifically to fit the Volkswagen T5 camper vans with a single rear door. This bike rack can also fit other vehicles with a raised roof, such as the VW California and VW Multivan. Able to hold a maximum capacity of 4 bikes, this bike rack is ideal for the whole family.

Suitable for the VW T5 & 5.1 with a single up-lift rear tailgate from July 2003 onwards. The tailgate boot can be opened with the rack fitted, may need to be held open due to addition weight. Installation is simple, no drilling required. The rack simply hooks over the top of the tailgate, while the upper brackets fasten to your vans rear reinforcement points. To prevent damage to your vehicle, each bracket is fitted with a protective plastic support. Coming with a strong lower bar for added stability.

Please note: we cannot accept returns on bike racks. Please ensure this item is compatible with your vehicle before purchasing.

Carry-Bike VW T5 Key Features

  • Compatible with VW T5 campervans with a single rear door
  • Also suitable for VW California and VW Multivan
  • Carries two bikes, with the option of carrying up to four by using Rail Quick Pro
  • Supplied with two Rail Quick Pro Rails, Bike Block Pro 1, Bike Block Pro D2, four Quick-Safe Fixing Straps, and one Security Strip

Product Name: Vango Shangri-La Light Single Sleeping Bag
Product Description:
Vango Shangri-La Light Single Sleeping Bag

Discover the ultimate in camping comfort with the Vango Shangri-La Light Single Sleeping Bag, a luxurious addition to your outdoor gear that feels just like your bedding at home. This eco-friendly sleeping bag, part of Vango's Earth Collection, is crafted from organic cotton and 100% recycled polyester, offering a soft, hypoallergenic feel that keeps you cool and comfortable on warmer nights. Designed for a perfect night's sleep, its spacious square shape allows for greater freedom of movement, and an integrated headrest provides a better sleeping position for reduced aches and pains. Practical features like a two-way auto-lock zip with a zip guard prevent snagging, while the compression carry bag ensures a small pack size for easy storage and transport. With a 5.5 Tog rating and a comfort temperature of 16°C, this versatile sleeping bag is perfect for camping, campervan trips, or as a cosy spare for guests. Caring for the sleeping bag is easy as it is machine washable at 30 degrees.

Vango Shangri-La Light Features

  • Temperature rated to ISO 23537-1:2016
  • Integrated headrest provides extra comfort and warmth for your head
  • Square sleeping bag provides extra space to have greater freedom of movement when sleeping
  • Auto-lock two-way zip seals in warmth and provides adjustable ventilation. Auto-lock prevents the bag from opening during the night and can be accessed from inside the bag
  • Woven zip puller - allows you to quickly and easily move the zip
  • Zip guard helps prevent the zip from snagging on the lining
  • Insulated zip baffle retains heat within the sleeping bag
  • Compression carry bag reduces pack size
  • Machine washable at 30 degrees

Product Name: Victron Energy Orion XS DC-DC 12V Battery Charger
Product Description:
Victron Energy Orion XS DC-DC Battery to Battery Charger – 12V 50A

Delivers powerful 50A charging with ultra-efficient performance for faster, smarter battery management

The Victron Energy Orion XS DC-DC Charger delivers up to 50A of charging power, making it ideal for the campervan, caravan, motorhome, marine and off-grid market. It keeps your leisure batteries charged while on the move, powering essential equipment with ease. Suitable for both traditional wet lead-acid and modern lithium batteries, it provides reliable, efficient energy wherever you travel.

With multiple automated safety and efficiency features, the Orion XS is a smart addition to any dual-battery system. Integration and control are simple, ensuring reliable charging without complexity.

The Orion XS is ideal for life on the road or at sea, keeping leisure batteries topped up and powering essentials like fridges, lights, pumps and inverters. It supports both lithium and lead-acid batteries, with smart alternator detection to protect the starter battery. Compact and rugged, its IP65-rated design withstands travel and marine conditions. With Victron system integration, you can easily monitor and control your power setup remotely from your phone or tablet.

Campervan Battery Charger Key Features

  • Configurable charging: Adjustable voltages to protect alternators and ensure correct battery charging
  • Adaptive charging algorithms: Optimises cycles for both shallow and deep discharges
  • Wide system compatibility: Operates with 12V, 24V, or mixed-voltage systems
  • High efficiency: Operates at 98.5% efficiency – five times more efficient than its predecessors. Aluminium circuit board technology keeps heat low for cooler operation
  • Complete electronic protection: Safeguards against overload, short circuit and overheating, with automatic output reduction at maximum temperature
  • VE.Direct system integration: Connect with your Victron system for simple monitoring and control, viewing performance data from anywhere
  • Low temperature protection: Stops charging automatically to protect lithium batteries in freezing conditions

The Orion XS combines intelligent charging with complete electronic protection, making it the reliable choice for dual-battery systems. Perfect for campervans, caravans, motorhomes and boats, it ensures your leisure batteries are charged safely, efficiently and without hassle.

Thanks to its powerful 50A output, ultra-efficient components, advanced charging algorithms and easy integration, the Victron Energy Orion XS DC-DC 12V 50A Charger is a compact, powerful and simple solution for modern off-grid and marine energy systems.

Product Name: Reich 25L Submersible Power Jet Plus Water Pump
Product Description:
Reich Submersible Power Jet Plus Pump for Caravan and Motorhome

25 Litre Water Pump

The Reich Power Jet Plus is a high pressure water pump used in caravans and motorhome. This 12v water pump is fully submersible, fully sealed for complete immersion to the bottom of your tank, drawing water in at the bottom and pumping it out at the top. The Power Jet Plus Pump can also be used with micro-switched taps to turn it on and off as you operate your tap. This 25 litre water pump provides sufficient water pressure in your caravan or in your motorhome, also can be used in marine craft and houseboats. Ideal for showers, kitchens and multiple outlets running at once.

This motorhome water pump provides max 25l/min and 2.1 bar, this guarantees sufficient water quality and pressure even over long cable distances or multiple open consumers at each point. With an automatic air vent built-in, this caravan water pump can self-ventilate to avoid airlocks and ensure consistent water flow.

Key Features

  • 12v submersible pump — perfect for caravans, motorhomes & boats
  • Built-in automatic ventilation and filter
  • Integrated water strainer
  • Pumps up to 25 litres per minute
  • 2.1bar and 75w power consumption
  • Suitable for use with switched taps

Product Name: Navy Load Hob and Sink Campervan Conversions Universal Kit
Product Description:
Navy Load Campervan Kitchen Universal Kit

Sink and Hob Installation Kit for Campervan, Caravan, Motorhome and Boat

The new Navy Load Campervan Kitchen Uni Kit 2510 is available with both a left hand and right hand sink. Featuring double burners and a folding micro-switched tap, this kitchen kit is just what you need for your motorhome conversion! An ideal sink and hob combination, this universal conversion kit comes with both LPG gas hose and an 8mm copper pipe. Allowing you to select your own regulator depending on the installation.

We've chosen a selection of parts and fittings to get you on the road as quickly as possibly. All of the components in this kit are quality parts which we've been selling to converters for many years - and are the right size to work with each other. This includes a Whale water pump, a waste and fresh water tank and pipes, a gas vent, p-clips, jubilee clips, gas pipe and fittings, electrical cable and connectors.

Included in our Universal Conversion Kit:

  • Navy Load Hob & Sink Unit
  • Folding Micro-Switched Cold Tap
  • Whale Submersible Pump
  • 2 x 10L Jerry Cans (Dimensions - L 28cm x W 13cm x H 34cm)

  • 2mtr x 20mm Waste Pipe
  • 75mm Floor Vent
  • Pack of 8 x P-Clips
  • 4 x Jubilee Clips
  • 3 Metre 12V Twin Core Cable
  • 1 x 8mm Straight Compression Coupling
  • 1 x 8mm Compression Nozzle
  • 1mtr LPG Gas Hose
  • 2mtr x 8mm Copper Pipe
  • Cable Connectors
  • Template will be drawn on the box for you

  • Safety Ignition System: Flame failure device is included for peach of mind that the gas will shut off if the flame is extinguished unexpectedly
  • Left and Right Sink Options: Choice of left or right sink for customizability

Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Screenhouse 6 Camping Shelter

6 Panel Pop Up Camping Gazebo

The Outdoor Revolution Camping Gazebo and Utility Shelter provides protection against the weather and can be pitched in thanks to its innovative fibreglass pop up system. Designed as an ideal day shelter for breathability and comfort, with built-in mesh side panels to allow constant airflow while keeping the bugs out. Featuring a quick erect fibreglass pop-up system to allow you to set up in seconds! Crafted out of high quality 240HD high density all weather fabric combined with a hydrostatic head rating of 4000mm, this camping gazebo ensures you stay dry and protected from all weather. Additional weather protection features including corner storm strap anchor points, detachable guylines with quick adjusters, and ground anchor webbing for secure setup and stability during extreme weather including harsh winds.

This pop up day shelter is not only ideal for camping trips with the family but also for caravan holidays, campervan & motorhome adventures, beach days out, fishing trips and days out in the garden. Suitable for use for cooking, relaxing, storage, dining and shelter. Perfect for your next adventure in the sun!

Screenhouse Key Features

  • Ideal for fishing, camping & more!
  • Waterproof and weatherproof
  • Quick erect fibreglass pole popup system
  • Breathable phoenix mesh side panels
  • PE mudwall to base
  • Detachable guylines with quick adjusters
  • Corner storm strap anchor points
  • Fully zip back front doors
  • Kador strip with 6mmm piping for windbreak attachment
  • Ground anchor webbing secure guying system
  • Adjustable webbing pegging system
  • Peg set, guy lines and carry bag included

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Oxygen Pro 3 Panel Windbreak
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Oxygen Pro 3 Panel Windbreak

Inflatable Camping Windscreen

The Outdoor Revolution Oxygen Pro 3 Panel Windbreak is an inflatable windbreak used for camping and windy days outdoors. This premium five metre, three-panelled inflatable windscreen has been designed specifically for caravan, campervan owners and avid campers! Designed to deflect wind for up to five metres, crafted with aesthetics in mind to complement the style of your camping setup. With a modular design to extend the windbreak to suit your needs. Featuring high density all weather fabric, crystal clear windows and an intuitive inflation system, this camping windbreak is perfect for your family tent, drive-away awning or your caravan awning.

The Oxygen Pro 3 windbreak is fully expandable, with the optional single panel extension to extend your windbreak infinitely to whatever size is required. Simply connect together using the included plastic figure of 8 strip. There is no limit to the number of panels that can be added to your windbreak! Each section is flexibly hinged, allowing you to angle individual panels to suit your needs.

Inflatable Windbreak Key Features

  • 600HDE high density all weather premium fabric
  • Easy inflation Oxygen Air Frame with DSV valve inflation system
  • PVC crystal clear windows on each panel
  • Flexible hinged system
  • Kader strip to both ends for attaching to a vertical awning rail or adding an extra accessory extension panel
  • Elastic bungee peg down points
  • Reflective guy lines for visibility
  • Included pegs, air pump and carry bag

Truma Aventa Comfort 2nd Generation Air Conditioning Unit for Campervan, Caravan and Motorhome

Lightweight Performance Cooling Unit

The Truma Aventa Comfort Gen 2 Air Conditioning Unit is a new and improved model from Truma, even lighter and quieter! Available in a white or black unit, with a stone grey or cappuccino cream air distributer, this caravan air con unit ensures top performance and a long lifespan. The Truma motorhome home air con unit is suitable for vehicles with a length of 7.5m or more, including your motorhome, campervan or caravan.

Thanks to its night mode, the 2nd Generation Aventa Comfort is very quiet and makes very little noise, allowing you to sleep through the night on hot days. Featuring an adjustable compressor fan that reduces noise, you'll be able to sleep soundly. Also featuring an integrated heat pump that has a heating output of 2000W. Allowing you to enjoy your campervan or motorhome even in the colder seasons! Designed for functionality and aesthetics to give you the perfect climate all year round.

Aventa Comfort 2nd Gen Key Features

  • 2nd generation technology
  • Efficient cooling even in hot weather
  • Quiet operation
  • Heating through integrated heat pump
  • Easily controlled with included Bluetooth remote control, via an iNet X panel, the iNet X app or via a new CP Plus
  • Suitable to integrate  into almost all vehicle configurations
  • Most suited to vehicles with a length of 7 meters or more

Product Description:
Truma Aventa Compact 2nd Generation Air Conditioner

Compact Air Cooling Unit for Caravan, Motorhome and Campervan

The Truma Aventa Compact Gen 2 Air Conditioner Unit for campervans, caravans and motorhomes. The all new specification 2nd generation Aventa unit ensures efficient cooling and optimal performance thanks to its 1700W of cooling power, or upgrade to the Aventa Compact Plus with 2200W of cooling power. With quiet operation thanks to its adjustable compressor and fan, ensuring that vibrations and noises are reduced to a minimum. Available in various colours, supplied as a black or white unit, with the choice of stone grey or cappuccino cream air distributors to suit the colour scheme of your van.

Also featuring an integrated heating pump, the Aventa Compact outputs 1200W of heating power, and the Compact Plus model can output 1500W of heating power, enabling you to enjoy your campervan, caravan or motorhome during the colder months. Thanks to the heating capabilities of this compact air conditioning unit, you can enjoy the outdoors all year round. An advanced feature of the Aventa air con system is its low starting current. Allowing it to be operated at campsites with lower electrical protection without any problems and without causing overloading. 

This campervan air conditioning unit is super lightweight, making it ideal for installations and travel without weighing down the weight of your mobile van. Thanks to its small dimensions, the 2nd generation Aventa Compact and Aventa Compact Plus is perfect for van conversions and retrofitting. Featuring full control capabilities via included Bluetooth remote control. Enabling you to easily adjust the temperature of your van from the push of a button. Need to sleep? The super quiet Night Mode setting ensures a silent nights sleep. No more noisy fans, use night mode to sleep peacefully at night at the cool temperature you desire.

Aventa Compact & Compact Plus Key Features

  • New 2nd generation technology
  • Silent operation
  • Compact size
  • Heating features
  • Efficient cooling in your whole caravan
  • Included Bluetooth remote control for easy adjustment of temperature

Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Lucca Air Mesh Chair for Camping

Quick Dry, Reclining, Camping Chair

The Outdoor Revolution Lucca Air Mesh Chair is a luxury reclining camping chair made from revolutionary quick dry foam padding for added convenience and comfort. The Lucca chair is a hybrid design camping chair with all the features of a reclining chair and the pack size of a traditional camping chair. This chair dries in a matter of minutes after a shower of rain, making it a highly convenient seat after sudden showers. Crafted using a sturdy steel frame for extra support, featuring a break mechanism to prevent the chair from suddenly reclining. This camping chair is suitable as an upright chair or a reclining chair, able to adjust to suit your needs. Suitable for your outdoor campervan dining table, relaxing in your caravans awning or reclining in the sun outside your motorhome.

Featuring a 2cm thick foam layer for comfort and breathability, keeping you cool in the summer on hot days. With an exceptionally strong frame that can support up to 100kg, and plastic feet that protect your tents inner floor, making this an ideal camping chair for you. The Outdoor Revolution Lucca Chair comes with a carry bag included keeping it protected during storage and travel in your motorhome or campervan.

Luxury Reclining Camping Chair Features:

  • 3 reclining positions
  • Under seat drinks holder
  • High-quality air mesh material
  • Strong, sturdy steel frame
  • 2cm foam padding for extra comfort

Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Camp Star Midi / Double Self Inflating Camping Mattress

100mm Inflatable Sleeping Mat

The Outdoor Revolution Camp Star 100mm Self-Inflating Mattress for camping, caravans, motorhomes and campervans. Available in two models, the Camp Star Midi; a single mattress suitable for one person, and the Camp Star Double; double mattress suitable for two people. Both models are crafted from premium high-quality luxury material, making them an ideal self-inflating sleeping mat for yourself or your guests.

This camping bed offers extreme comfort, reliability and value for money. For use as a bed on the hard ground when camping to provide extra comfort, as a main bed for you camper or motorhome, and use as a spare bed in your caravan. With a thickness of 10cm deep, you can enjoy superior comfort and a great night sleep wherever you are. Crafted out of high-quality peach polyester on both the top and the base of the mattress, making it completely reversible. Featuring 10cm flat foam with built-in horizontal holes for a light weight, compact, compressible design that can be easily packed away.

Inflate via the one-way Cyclone Valves located at the bottom of the mat, single inflation for the Midi model, dual inflation on the Double model. This robust valve allows for easy inflation and deflation of the camping mattress allowing you to quickly inflate the mat in minutes. This blow up bed is perfect for your next family holiday to the caravan, a top of the range sleeping bed for campervans and motorhomes!

Midi/Double Self-Inflating Camping Mattress Key Features

  • High quality 75D*150D Peach Fabric embossed with PVC coating
  • Integrated 10cm deep flat foam with horizontal drill holes for 4 star comfort rating
  • Included carry bag for transport and storage

Product Name: Vango Tuscany Chair and Footrest Bundle
Option Set: Vango Tuscany Camping Chair and Footrest Bundle
Product Description:
Vango Tuscany Chair and Footrest Bundle

Luxury Reclining Chair and Footstool for Caravan & Motorhome

The Vango Tuscany Camping Chair and Footrest is a premium chair bundle ideal for camping, caravans and motorhomes. Offering extreme comfort, this high-quality reclining chair features a stylish frame made from durable aluminium and the backrest features strong Dura-Climate padded fabric with a heather effect design for a stylish look. Suitable for outside your caravan with its water-resistant material to protect from rainy weather.

To maximise comfort, this chair features 7 built-in reclining positions and practical armrests for additional support. The Tuscany Chair and Footstool is also suitable for your motorhome and campervan, with its ability to fold flat for quick and easy storage and its light weight, this camping chair is the perfect travel companion for your campervan holiday.

This reclining camping chair is also fit for your home and garden. With its robust and modern design that can suit any environment, perfect for family BBQs and beach days out! The footstool easy attaches to the camping chair via a clip-on attachment, allowing you to fully relax on your reclined chair without struggle or hassle. 

Vango Tuscany Features:

  • Fully reclining with 7 adjustable positions
  • Hard armrest for added comfort and support
  • Padded seat and backrest for increased comfort
  • Lightweight and strong aluminium frame
  • Folds flat for easy transport and storage
  • Waterproof and quick drying making it perfect for relaxing outdoors
  • Clip-on attachment for simple, quick fitting

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Q 3.0+ Quick Pitch Tent
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Q 3.0+ Quick Pitch Tent

The Outdoor Revolution Q 3.0+ Quick Pitch Tent offers a seamless camping experience with its unique and efficient design. Utilising a patented Quick Pitch Dura-Tech fibreglass pole system, the entire tent unfolds as a single piece, allowing for a super-speedy setup in under 5 minutes without the hassle of threading poles.

Perfect for individuals, and couples, its lightweight and compact pack size is designed to save space during transportation. Manufactured with a 3000mm hydrostatic head, the tent offers reliable weather protection. The hex-shaped design maximises interior space, including a darkened twilight micro polyester inner for comfortable sleeping and convenient front and rear entrances that provide extra storage or cooking space. This tent truly simplifies pitching, so you can spend less time setting up and more time enjoying your trip.

Outdoor Revolution Q 3.0+ Features

  • Quick Pitch Dura-Tech fibreglass pole system
  • Can be pitched in under 5 minutes
  • Lightweight and compact pack size
  • 120HDE high density all weather lightweight fabric
  • Hex shape design for optimum interior space
  • Convenient zip-back rear entry with storage space
  • Front entrance zip up door with cooking/storage space
  • Darkened twilight micro polyester inner bedroom

Q 3.0+ Quick Pitch Tent Specification

  • Weight: 5.15kg
  • Pack Size: 75 x 21 x 21cm
  • Footprint: 372 x 287cm
  • Hydrostatic Head: 3000mm

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Q Cruiser 3.0 Quick Pitch Tent
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Q Cruiser 3.0 Quick Pitch Tent

The Outdoor Revolution Q Cruiser 3.0 Quick Pitch Tent offers an effortless camping experience with its lightning-fast setup. Thanks to the patented Quick Pitch Dura-Tech fibreglass pole system, this tent can be erected in under 5 minutes without any of the fuss of traditional pole tents. Designed with a compact pack size and lightweight build, it's the perfect choice for couples and individuals on the move. Inside, a darkened micro polyester inner provides a spacious and comfortable sleeping area for up to three people.

The tent features both a convenient side door and a zip-up front door that can be converted into a canopy (poles not included) for a sheltered outdoor space. Constructed from 120HDE high-density fabric with a 3000mm hydrostatic head, the Q Cruiser is a simple, durable, and versatile tent for any short-stay adventure.

Outdoor Revolution Q Cruiser 3.0 Features

  • Quick Pitch Dura-Tech fibreglass pole system
  • Can be pitched in under 5 minutes
  • Light weight and compact pack size

  • Hydrostatic head 3000mm
  • Zip up front door access with front storage space and side door
  • Zip up front door can be made into a canopy (canopy poles not included)
  • Darkened twilight micro polyester 3 person inner bedroom
  • Includes peg set and carry bag

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Cyclone Valve SIM Pump
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Cyclone Valve SIM Pump

Inflating Mattress Electric Pump for Camping

The Outdoor Revolution Cyclone Valve Self-Inflating Mattress Pump is the perfect tool for your camping setup. A recommended camping accessory perfect for travel and outdoors. This electric mattress pump is rechargeable and is suitable for most self-inflating mattresses that use a cyclone valve. Simply attach the pump to your mattresses valve for quick, rapid and efficient inflation. Alternatively, you can also deflate your air mattress using this portable camping pump. A brilliant quick and easy solution for those less able to use a manual hand pump in limited space such as in tents, campervans, motorhomes and caravans.

Inflate your mattress in a matter of seconds with this campervan air mattress electric pump. This lightweight blow up mattress pump is portable and battery operated making it ideal to take on your motorhome holidays. Also suitable for use with vacuum storage bags for efficiently packing for your caravan holiday or your upcoming camping trip. This pump can be used for both inflation and deflation by switching between the air inlet/outlet ports. Long battery life, quick and easy to charge via USB C Type. 

Self-Inflating Mattress Pump Key Features

  • Rechargeable electric pump
  • Ideal for limited space
  • Fast inflation and deflation
  • Supplied with pump attachments including Cyclone SIM Nozzle, Universal Inflator Nozzle, Swimming Pool Inflator Nozzle
  • Included USB-C charger lead
  • Suitable for self-inflating mattresses, vacuum seal bags and swimming pool accessories

Product Name: Fiamma F45S Deep Black Wall Mount Awning for Campervan and Motorhome (Without Brackets)
Product Description:
Fiamma F45s 260 & 300 Awning without Brackets in Deep Black, Royal Grey

Campervan and Motorhome Wall Mount Awning

The Fiamma F45s Wall Mount Campervan Awning is available in two sizes; 260cm and 300cm in a deep black casing with royal grey awning fabric. This awning is NOT supplied with brackets for your freedom to choose vehicle specific brackets (sold separately). Suitable for motorhomes and campervans, this easy to install wall mount awning is perfect for your next adventure. The very latest, strongest and much improved version of the well known Fiamma F45 wind out awnings for Motorhomes and Camper vans. Smooth and silent when winding in and out, even silent when travelling, due to the aerodynamic end caps, which are now made in ‘tree resistant’ aluminium!

The Royal Grey canopy is fully waterproof and washable, perfect for enjoying the outdoors even in the harshest of weathers. The front wind out aluminium bar uniquely has two guide grooves to allow the fitting of two different accessories at the same time. The legs which are stored within the front bar, can stand upon the ground, or can be clipped to the motorhomes sidewall. A crank handle is included with the F45s awning.

When folded away, the F45s Wind-Out Awning takes up very little space, operated using the easy-to-hook manual winch loop to easily open and close your canopy. Simple, hassle-free operation for quick and easy wind out awning with the option of upgrading your awning with the Fiamma F45s Compact Awning Motor Kit or the Fiamma Motor Kit Advanced for F45s Awning (sold separately). Ideal for motorhome holidays and journeys in your campervan to the seaside or campsite.

Campervan Awning without Brackets Key Features

  • Manual winch opening and closing
  • Wall installation
  • Installation brackets not included to give fitter freedom to choose
  • Designed for motorhome, caravan, van conversion & campervans

Compatible with a range of accessories

  • Awning Lights: Brighten up your camping area with our energy-efficient LED Caravan Lights. Perfect for enjoying the outdoors in the evening with friends and family
  • Side Panels: Keep the bugs out with our Fiamma Awning Side Panels. Great for staying dry and blocking the wind, enjoy outside in any weather!
  • Groundsheets: Crafted for protecting the bottom of your awning from rough and hard surfaces. Ideal for creating a layer on the ground outside your motorhome for comfort and keeping your feet dry!
  • Motor Kits: Upgrade your camper van awning with one of our advanced motor kits! Control your awning on your phone or at the push of a button. Easier operation for those unable to put in manual effort
  • Tie Down Kits & Fixing Plates: Securely fasten your awning in place! Great for outdoor camping on windy days!

Product Name: Vango Elements Proshield 4 Panel Windbreak and Gate
Product Description:
Vango Elements Proshield 4 Panel Windbreak and Gate

Create a private and protected space on your campsite with the Vango Elements Proshield 4 Panel Windbreak and Gate Bundle. The four-panel windbreak provides a robust shield from the wind, ensuring that relaxing is never interrupted by the elements. It is constructed from Vango’s new Elements ProShield fabric, a durable 300D material with a 6,000mm hydrostatic head and Colour Lok technology that perfectly matches your Vango awning. The windbreak stands strong with a steel frame and a durable anchor system, allowing it to be freestanding without the need for guy lines. This bundle includes a matching gate, which adds extra flexibility and creates a secure area for children or pets. With a simple, easy-to-use design and a steel frame, the gate’s opening direction can be changed to suit your pitch. Both items come with their own carry bag for simple transport and storage

Vango Elements Proshield 4 Panel Windbreak Features

  • Elements ProShield - Robust, durable and waterproof. 300D fabric with an HH rating of 6,000MM. Benefits from ColourLok technology to aid colour retention.
  • Durable anchor system to ensure windbreak remains freestanding without the use of the guy lines.
  • Steel rock pegs included with a handy carry bag.
  • Steel frame.
  • Carry Bag Included.

Vango Elements Proshield Gate Features

  • Elements ProShield - Robust, durable and waterproof. 300D fabric with an HH rating of 6,000MM. Benefits from ColourLok technology to aid colour retention.
  • Direction of the gate opening can changed easily.
  • Steel frame.

Product Description:
Isabella Magnum Alba Caravan Awning

Magnum Alba 260, 340 and 400

Experience the freedom of a spacious touring awning with the Isabella Magnum Alba. Available in three sizes; 260, 340, and 400, this porch awning is designed for caravanners who are always on the move, offering a fast and simple setup without compromising on space.

Whether you're looking for a quick shelter for an overnight stop or a comfortable living area for a temporary stay, the Magnum Alba is your perfect companion. Its easy-to-pitch system make it a fantastic choice for touring.

  • Removable front and side panels, allowing you to adapt the awning to your needs
  • Curtains on all windows for privacy
  • Suitable for all seasons and perfect for temporary or weekend stays
  • All awnings fit caravan heights between 235cm and 250cm

Product Name: Isabella Buddy Front and Side Panels for Wind Out Awnings
Product Description:
Isabella Buddy Side and Front Panels for Wind Out Awnings

Create the ideal privacy room for your wind out awning

The Isabella Buddy panels are designed to give flexible customisation to your wind out awning. Start with the side panels and select your desired width to create a sheltered room under your awning. 

Attached to the awning with magnets, the side panels can be positioned anywhere along your awning, giving you the unique flexibility to create a fully enclosed living space or a partial porch area. You can place Buddy wherever you like on the awning, giving you the unique flexibility to create both an enclosed living space and a covered porch under the motorhome's awning, as long as it does not interfere with your canopy roof struts. When the sides are positioned, simply zip the front panel on to create an enclosed room for some shelter, or for some extra warmth on a cool day.

Built for Comfort and Durability

The Buddy is crafted from Isacryl, a robust, fibre-dyed acrylic material that ensures your colours stay vibrant over time and helps to maintain a comfortable indoor climate. Enjoy your surroundings with an unobstructed view, thanks to the large windows in both the front and side panels.

The Buddy offers plenty of options for ventilation, including integrated top ventilation and mosquito nets in the side panels. For even more airflow, you can lower the windows on the front panels and create a veranda using the supplied pole. Foam padding at the vehicle end ensures a tight, secure fit against your motorhome.

Please note that curtains are not included as standard and are supplied separately.

Isabella Buddy Panel Features

  • Side panels attach with magnets and can be placed anywhere along the awning (as long as it does not interfere with your canopy roof struts)
  • Windows can be zipped down
  • Windows can lower on the front panels to create a veranda
  • Can fit common wind out awnings such as Fiamma, Dometic and Thule

Isabella Buddy Panel Specification

Buddy Side Panel Set

  • 2x side panels
  • Both buddy side panels have integrated top ventilation and mosquito nets
  • Depth: 230cm
  • Fits caravan heights between: 240cm - 275cm
  • Weight: 15.14kg

Buddy Front Panel 270

  • Width: 270cm
  • Height: 190cm-214cm
  • Weight: 4.64kg

Buddy Front Panel 320

  • Width: 320cm
  • Height: 190cm-214cm
  • Weight: 5.15kg

Buddy Front Panel 370

  • Width: 370cm
  • Height: 190cm-214cm
  • Weight: 5.67kg

Buddy Front Panel 420

  • Width: 420cm
  • Height: 190cm-214cm
  • Weight: 6.13kg

Buddy Front Panel 470

  • Width: 470cm
  • Height: 190cm-214cm
  • Weight: 6.63kg

Product Name: Isabella Wind Front and Side Panels for Wind Out Awnings
Product Description:
Isabella Wind Front & Side Panels for Wind Out Awnings

Transform the area under your wind-out awning into a cosy, sheltered outdoor space with the Isabella Wind Front & Side Panels. These durable, easy-to-fit panels are designed to provide extra comfort and protection from the elements, allowing you to relax and enjoy your surroundings.

The Wind Front panels are available in widths of 120cm or 220cm and features a large, clear window that lets in plenty of natural light. For complete shelter, you can add a Wind Side panel, available in both right and left, which secures against your caravan or motorhome with three powerful suction cups to reduce draughts.

Both the front and side panels are made from a durable, coated polyester fabric to ensure they stand up to the weather. The side panel's CarbonX roof pole is both lightweight and strong, featuring a telescopic design with an IsaFix locking bracket for simple, efficient setup. You can even create two separate rooms by repositioning the central roof pole, giving you even more flexibility.

For extra shelter, you can combine the Wind Side with a Wind Front, which is also easily mounted on the caravan’s or vehicle’s roll out awning.

Isabella Wind Front & Side Panel Features

  • Fits caravan heights between 245cm and 270 cm
  • Fits awnings with projection lengths of 250cm
  • Suitable for popular wind out awnings such as Thule, Dometic and Fiamma
  • Water and UV Resistant
  • Durable material
  • Includes pegs

Isabella Wind Panel Specifications

Wind Side 250 Left and Right

  • Width: 240cm
  • Depth: 240cm
  • Weight: 4.11kg

Wind Front 120

  • Width: 120cm
  • Height: 200cm - 223cm

Wind Front 220

  • Height: 200cm - 223cm

Product Name: Isabella Thor Foldable Reclining Camping Chair
Product Description:
Isabella Thor Foldable Reclining Chair

Relax in ultimate comfort on your next camping trip with the Isabella Thor chair. This padded, luxury chair has a supportive neck cushion, comfortable armrests, and an adjustable backrest that can be set to eight different positions.

Crafted with a lightweight yet sturdy aluminium frame, the Thor chair is easy to carry and simple to fold away, making it a convenient choice for any caravan or motorhome adventure. It is available in two colours, dark grey and light grey, so you can choose the perfect style for your setup.

With a maximum load capacity of 120kg and a weight of just 5.51kg, this chair combines robust design with portability. Its generous dimensions and high backrest ensure a comfortable experience for everyone.

Isabella Thor Features

  • Foldable
  • Reclining
  • Available in dark grey or light grey
  • Lightweight aluminium frame
  • Optional footrest and storage pocket - sold separately

Product Name: Royal Leisure Charcoal Welbeck Caravan Porch Awning
Product Description:
Royal Leisure Welbeck Caravan Porch Awning

The Royal Leisure Welbeck Porch Awning is a modern and stylish addition to your caravan, designed to provide a sheltered space to relax and unwind. Made from durable polyester with a 2000mm hydrostatic head rating, it's perfect for light rain and wind.

The awning features two roll-up front panels and two side doors with full mesh ventilation to keep the air flowing. The awning is supported by a robust frame of fibreglass and steel poles, and it comes complete with a draught skirt, pegs, and rear support poles that can be used as canopy poles for extra versatility. The Welbeck is designed to fit caravans with a rail height of 235cm to 250cm and is available in two sizes; 260cm and 390cm.

Royal Welbeck Awning Features

  • Modern design
  • Made from polyester
  • Waterproofing: 2000mm HH
  • 2 roll-up front panels
  • Two side doors with full mesh ventilation panels
  • Fibreglass and steel poles
  • Includes draught skirt, pegs, and rear support poles that can be used as canopy poles
  • Designed to fit caravans between heights 235cm-250cm

Royal Welbeck Caravan Awning Specification

260 Welbeck Awning

  • Width: 260cm
  • Depth: 235cm
  • Weight: 12.8kg

390 Welbeck Awning

  • Width: 390cm
  • Depth: 235cm
  • Weight: 15.8kg

Inflatable Wind Breaker

The Royal Leisure Inflatable 5 Panel Windbreak is the perfect wind blocker for your family camping holiday. Inflate in a matter of minutes with this quick pitch camping essential, featuring a single point inflation system to allow for quick and easy inflation/deflation. Suitable for beach days, picnics and camping, you can stay protected from the windy weather whatever the occasion.

A free dual action hand-pump is also included with this camping windbreak, allowing you to inflate this straight out of the box. Featuring 5 fixed inflatable panels allowing for perfect placement of the windbreak, allowing you to always experience the maximum level of wind protection around your campsite.

Designed for long-lasting protection, made from 150D material to create a reliable, durable wind shield that will last. The perfect shelter against the wind during picnics, on the beach, for barbeques, or outside your tent, motorhome, campervan or caravan awning. Enjoy the outdoors without the harsh weather with this Royal Leisure Inflatable Windbreak.

5 Panel Camping Windbreak Key Features:

  • 5 fixed panels for ideal shape around your campsite
  • Protection against the elements

Did you know?

Still unsure? Contact us via phone or message with your appliance details and any information from the sticker (model number, production number, SKU, and serial number). Product Name: Isabella Ventura Air Vita Driveaway Awning
Product Description:
Isabella Ventura Air Vita Driveaway Awning

The Isabella Ventura AIR Vita is a freestanding air awning that can be left while you drive away with your motorhome or campervan. Thanks to all air channels being connected, you can quickly inflate the awning from one valve which minimises the risk of air leaks. Want to enjoy the sun without a canvas tent around you? Unzip all fronts and sides and turn your awning into a large sun canopy. Alternatively, roll away the panels to increase airflow in the awning. Side panels come fitted with mosquito nets to keep bugs out.

The tunnel is necessary to ensure a tight and correct connection between Vita and your vehicle. The adjustable tunnel has tapes that create a tight connection to prevent water ingress. The rear wall of the awning can be rolled to the side for easy access to the tunnel. The tunnel is available in three different heights: Small (180-200 cm), Medium (240-260 cm) and Large (260-280 cm). The Large tunnel also has a built-in air tube for extra stability.

To mount the awning on the vehicle, choose a tunnel with a height that suits your motorhome or campervan.

Isabella Ventura Air Vita Features

  • Tunnel available in three heights: Small (180-200 cm), Medium (240-260) and Large (260-280 cm)
  • Air tubes are connected in one system,  inflate from one valve
  • Deflate from 3 valves
  • Sides and fronts can be rolled away, or fully unzipped to turn the awning into a large sun canopy
  • Ventilation in the front and mosquito nets on the sides

Ventura Air Vita Driveaway Awning Specification

Ventura AIR Vita

  • Depth: 270cm
  • Roof Material: Printed polyester
  • Sides Material: Fibre dyed polyester and
  • Inner Skirt Material: Durable PVC
  • Includes:
    • Curtains
    • Transport bag
    • Electric 12V pump
    • Draught skirt
    • Standard wheel cover
    • Pegs

Ventura AIR Vita Tunnel S

  • Comes with pegs and a bag
  • Fits caravan heights between: 180-200cm
  • Weight incl Airtubes: 4.76kg

Ventura AIR Vita Tunnel M

  • Comes with pegs and a bag
  • Fits caravan heights between: 240-260cm
  • Weight incl Airtubes: 5.03kg

Ventura AIR Vita Tunnel L

  • Comes with pegs, a bag and additional air tube
  • Fits caravan heights between: 260-280cm
  • Weight incl Airtubes: 6.76kg

Product Name: Dorema Magnum Airforce All Season Caravan Awning
Product Description:
Dorema Magnum AirForce Caravan Awning

Luxury All-Season Caravan Air Awning

Featuring the latest awning technology, the Dorema Magnum AirForce Awning is a premium awning for caravan owners. Available in two sizes, 260 & 390 models, this awning is able to fit caravans with an awning rail height of between 235-250m. Each model comes ready for inflation with an Easy Air Frame System (EAF) to allow for an easy installation from the get-go. Featuring a single valve inflation point, this luxury awning can be set-up in a matter of minutes.

Crafted from high-quality material, the Dorema Magnum Awning is suitable for any season. Featuring TenCate All Season coated polyester, for reliable performance and added durability and weatherproofing. With side panels fitted with a door that can be rolled up to create a wide, open entrance suitable for creating airflow during the warm summer months. Its roof features a printed design pattern on the inside, creating a modern, aesthetic inner look to your awning. This premium inflatable awning also features front panels that can be rolled up or zipped out for ventilation. Built-in privacy blinds are fitted to all windows for added privacy and natural light control.

This awning is extension ready! With the ability to add extensions to expand the interior size of the awning.

Dorema Magnum Air Awning Key Features:

  • Easy Air Frame (EAF) with a single inflation point for easy setup
  • Manufactured using high-quality materials
  • Suitable for camping all year round
  • Internal privacy blinds on all windows
  • Included hand pump

Product Description:
Wild Country Helm Compact Tent

The Wild Country Helm Compact Tent range from Terra Nova offers award-winning performance and outstanding value, making it a trusted choice for backpackers and cycle tourers alike.

Recognised with Trail Magazine’s Gear of the Year 2023 and Best Value Award 2022, the Helm Compact series is designed to deliver reliable shelter, spacious interiors, and excellent ventilation across three seasons. The tents eco-friendly features include a recycled, PFC-free inner and groundsheet, alongside a durable solution-dyed flysheet for enhanced sustainability without compromising strength.

Available in one, two, and three-person models, the Helm Compact combines lightweight tent construction with a stable, free-standing design that performs on varied terrain. Each tent packs down neatly for easy transport, perfect for space-conscious adventurers, while details such as generous porch storage, dual entrances on larger models, and quick pitch technology ensure comfort and convenience on every trip.

Wild Country Helm Compact Features

  • 3 season
  • Available in 3 sizes
  • Excellent ventilation
  • Free-standing design
  • Compact easy pitch and pack design
  • Colour coded poles, sleeves and tabs
  • Recycled PFC-free inner and groundsheet fabric

Terra Nova Helm Compact Specification

  • All tents include poles, alloy pegs and guy lines
  • Internal storage space (compact 1 only)
  • Suitable for 3 seasons

  • Sleeps: 1
  • Min/Max Weight: 1.85kg/1.99kg
  • Packed Size: 35cm x 17cm
  • Number of Doors: 1
  • Inner Dimensions:
    • Length: 220cm, Height: 92cm, Width: 77cm
  • Front Porch Width: 45cm + Additional Back Porch: 40cm
  • Rear internal storage space accessed from inside the tent.

Helm Compact 2

  • Sleeps: 2
  • Min/Max Weight: 2.24kg/2.48kg
  • Packed Size: 32cm x 20cm
  • Number of Doors: 2

  • Porch Width (both sides): 54cm

Helm Compact 3

  • Sleeps: 3

  • Number of Doors: 2
  • Inner Dimensions:
    • Length: 225cm, Height: 120cm, Width: 165cm
  • Porch Width (both sides): 45cm

Product Name: Wild Country Halny Elite 2 Backpacking Tent
Product Description:
Wild Country Halny Elite 2 Backpacking Tent

Winner of Best Lightweight Tent at the 2025 Camping Awards, the Wild Country Halny Elite 2 from Terra Nova weighs a max of 1.59kg, offering an exceptional balance of low weight, durability and interior comfort, making it ideal for backpackers, cycle tourers and endurance athletes. The tent combines lightweight portability with a robust two-person designed for fast-paced adventures where every gram counts.

Updated with a recycled, PFC-free flysheet, inner and groundsheet, the Halny Elite 2 delivers outstanding waterproof protection while reducing environmental impact. Its versatile zippered flysheet enables dual awning setups with trekking poles, providing extra sheltered space and improved ventilation, while multiple vents and tie-back sections enhance airflow to reduce condensation. With dual side doors for easier access, a spacious inner length, and a compact packed size, this tent is both practical and portable.

Backed by Terra Nova's single-pole stability and easy pitch design, the Halny Elite 2 ensures reliable performance and quick setup in varied conditions, making it the perfect choice for lightweight three-season expeditions.

Wild Country Halny Elite 2 Features

  • Compact
  • Lightweight
  • Dual side doors
  • Single-pole stability
  • Use trekking poles (not included) to create dual awnings
  • Multiple vents and tie-back sections reduce condensation

Halny Elite 2 Tent Specification

  • Sleeps: 2
  • Season: 3-season
  • Min / Max Weight: 1.45kg / 1.59kg
  • Packed Size: 34cm X 19cm
  • Includes pegs, alloy poles and guylines
  • Doors: 1x C shape side entry
  • Inner Dimensions:
    • Length: 222cm, Width: 117cm (middle), 97cm (ends), Height: 88cm, End Height: 48cm, Porch: 38cm

Product Name: Wild Country Hoolie Compact Lightweight Camping Tent
Product Description:
Wild Country Hoolie Compact Lightweight Tent

The Wild Country Hoolie Compact tent range from camping award winners Terra Nova, combines lightweight performance with spacious, practical design, making it ideal for campers, backpackers and multi-day expeditions. Designed to maximise sleeping space without adding unnecessary weight, the Hoolie Compact 2 and 3 feature an extended tunnel shape and a generous porch for secure gear storage. With sustainable, PFC-free, recycled fabrics and a solution-dyed flysheet for improved UV resistance and durability, these tents offer excellent waterproof performance while remaining environmentally conscious. Excellent ventilation reduce condensation, ensuring a comfortable interior in all conditions, while the quick-pitch design and compact packed size make set-up fast and hassle-free.

Lightweight yet robust, the Hoolie Compact tent series is the perfect choice for wild camping, trekking and campers on the move.

Wild Country Hoolie Compact Features

  • 3-season rating
  • Large porch area
  • 1x front entry door
  • Spacious tunnel design
  • PFC-free recycled materials
  • Compact size makes carrying easy
  • Comes with pegs, alloy poles and guy lines
  • Plenty of ventilation to reduce condensation
  • Easy pitch and pack system is ideal for trekking

Thetford Cassette Toilet Separation Kit for C220 and C260

The Thetford Separation Kit is used to transform your existing cassette toilet into a separation toilet. Designed to separate urine and solid waste, eliminating the need for flushing water. The perfect way to upgrade your Thetford toilet, giving you an economical and environmentally friendly way to modernise your toilet setup without having to replace your entire toilet.

Ideal for caravan and motorhome owners with an existing Thetford cassette toilet, this kit combines odour control, ease of use, and efficient waste management wherever your travels take you!

Product Description:
Thetford S220-S & S260-S Separation Toilet for Caravan & Motorhome

Recessed Wall-Mounted Waterless Separation Toilet Waste Disposal

The Thetford S220-S and S260-S Separation Toilets are practical waste disposal solutions with a waterless design, available in two models for either mechanical or electric urine level indication. Designed to separate urine and solid waste without the need of flushing water. This hygienic toilet is ideal for caravan and motorhome owners in need of an efficient waterless solution for waste disposal.

Designed for recessed installation into the wall, with separate wall mounted installation for a control panel and flush button. This space saving design is ideal for smaller bathroom setups thanks to its sleek, wall-integrated appearance. The perfect solution for your caravan and motorhome, combining ease of use, odour control and efficient waste management wherever your travels take you!

Different from a traditional cassette toilet, which stores all waste in a single tanks, requires water for flushing and must be emptied at designated disposal points. This separation toilet has been designed as a waterless non-flush system, which separates liquids from solid waste without water to reduced odours. With separation toilets, disposal of waste is much easier and doesn't require fixed dumping points. 

Recessed Separation Toilet Key Features:

  • Choose between mechanical or electrical urine tank level indicator
  • Hygienic, waterless, eco-friendly separation of urine and solid waste
  • Blade to visually cover waste
  • Odour control to minimise bad smells
  • Leak free connection ensures secure discharge of urine tank
  • Easy installation with a complete bowl
  • Compatible with Thetford Ventilator Kit for active ventilation

What’s the difference between a CS & S?

The latest versions of the S220 and S260 Thetford Separator toilets come with two designs, a CS and S but what’s the difference?

The CS has been around for some time and comes with “cistern” or back plate, this allows for the toilet to be surface mounted to the wall whilst also housing the control panel and flush button. The S does not come with a “cistern” and requires part of the toilet to be recessed into the wall including control panel and flush button to be wall mounted.

Product Name: Ridge Monkey SpeedFlo Heavy Duty Water Carrier
Product Description:
Ridge Monkey SpeedFlo Heavy Duty Water Carrier

The Ridge Monkey SpeedFlo Heavy Duty Water Carrier is engineered to provide reliable, robust hydration for fishing, camping, and all demanding outdoor pursuits. Built to last, it features an extra-thick and robust HDPE body that can withstand harsh conditions. Transportation is made simple thanks to the secure carry handle and a water-tight lid for zero spills. The carrier is supplied with an updated, removable SpeedFlo tap that offers a simple, single-handed operation for controlled dispensing. Furthermore, the lid is uniquely vented to ensure fast, consistent water flow, and on the 10L, 15L, and 20L jerry can models, the tap conveniently stores within the lid itself.

Ridge Monkey SpeedFlo Water Carrier Features

  • Removable tap
  • New updated SpeedFlo tap
  • Water-tight interchangeable lid
  • Thick and robust HDPE construction
  • Able to operate mechanism with a single hand
  • Store tap inside lid of the 10L, 15L & 20L jerry can models
  • Vented lid to ensure a fast and controlled water flow

Product Description:
Ridge Monkey Outdoor Power Shower

Achieve a proper clean virtually anywhere with the Ridge Monkey Outdoor Portable Power Shower, an indispensable addition to your camping and outdoor gear. This unit delivers a strong and consistent flow rate of 4.5L/minute and is safe for use with both cold and hot water (up to 50°C). The shower head includes a versatile suction cup and hook for hands-free use, allowing you to easily secure it overhead or use it for washing pets, muddy bikes, boots, or cooking equipment. It operates efficiently by plugging into any 12V power source, such as a vehicle socket or power pack. When not in use, the shower lid is interchangeable with a conventional water carrier lid and tap (sold separately or included with compatible carriers), converting your unit back to a standard sealed water container.

Ridge Monkey Outdoor Shower Features

  • Suction cup or hanging loop for hands-free use
  • Ideal for showering or washing pets, hands, shoes, bikes, cutlery and more!
  • Use hot or cold water
  • Tilt the shower head to stop the water flow
  • Perfect for camping trips, fishing trips, and other outdoor stayovers
  • Easy and quick to assemble and operate
  • Powered by any device that supports 12V
  • Constructed from rugged and durable materials, perfect for outdoor pursuits
  • Fully waterproof IP67 electronic housing

Product Description:
Ridge Monkey Connect Outdoor Sandwich Toaster

Elevate your outdoor cooking with the RidgeMonkey Connect Outdoor Sandwich Toaster. Featuring an all-new granite-style coating, this toaster is tougher, more durable, and has a non-stick cooking, taking compact cookware to a whole new level.

The detachable hinge system transforms the toaster into two separate flat-bottomed frying pans, while the removable cool-touch handles allow the set to pack neatly inside a storage bag. The included heat-resistant utensils neatly pack inside the toaster for efficient space-saving storage. Its unique square shape minimises wasted space compared to traditional round cookware, making it a camping essential. Though perfect for a delicious toastie, the possibilities are endless—think pies, wraps, omelettes, and more! Constructed from lightweight aluminium with a sleek Gunmetal Grey finish, it heats evenly thanks to its ridged exterior, and it is PFOA-free.

Product Description:
Ridge Monkey Connect Deep Pan and Griddle Camping Cook Set

Elevate your outdoor cooking setup with the versatile RidgeMonkey Connect Deep Pan & Griddle. This ingenious system features a detachable hinge that transforms the unit into two separate cooking vessels: a deep-sided saucepan and a griddle pan/lid. The granite-style coating makes these pans incredibly tough, durable, and non-stick, setting a new standard for compact cookware. Built from lightweight aluminium with a ridged cooking surface, the pans ensure even heat transfer on all traditional stoves and direct heat sources (not suitable for use on induction hobs).

Product Description:
Dometic Flytec FT200 RHD and LHD Flyscreen for Fiat Ducato, Peugeot Boxer and Citroën Jumper

Bug Net for Motorhome Sliding Door RH/LH

A single pleated, high quality flyscreen for motorhomes with sliding doors with a height of H2 x250/x290 and vehicles with identical designs. Suitable for Fiat Ducato, Peugeot Boxer and Citroën Jumper motorhome campervan with either a left or a right sliding door. Covering the door entrance completely and closing with a magnetic lock to prevent insects entering your motorhome living space. Securely closed with a magnetic catch to create a seal.

Available as both a right hand drive or left hand drive model, choose the perfect flyscreen to suit your needs. Select the RHD for UK vans with steering on the right, if you are sat in the drivers seat, the door is on the left. Select LHD model when your campervan steering wheel is on the left hand side. If you're sat in the drivers seat, the sliding door is on the right. The best choice for protecting the inside of your campervan or motorhome from mosquitos, flies and insects.

Motorhome Sliding Door Flyscreen Key Features:

  • Completely covers the sliding door
  • Easy and simple to install
  • Magnetic catches for convenient opening and closing

Product Description:
Dometic RMDT 10.5T/10.5XT 3-Way Caravan Absorption Refrigerator Freezer

New Generation 3 Way Tower Fridge with Oven

The all new generation caravan absorption fridge is available in two models; the RMDT 10.5T Absorption Fridge and the RMDT 10.5XT Extra Deep Absorption Fridge. This premium 3-way absorption refrigerator-oven is designed to operate using flexible power options such as 12V, 230V or gas. Featuring a dual hinged door for convenience and accessibility wherever you install your fridge. With a built-in TFT colour display panel, designed for easy operation. A space-saving dual purpose refrigerator-oven for caravans without room for multiple kitchen appliances.

With a built-in freezer and built-in oven, this refrigerator is top of the market compared to its competitors. Featuring a total volume of 1531L/1771L, this Dometic caravan fridge offers a large storage capacity, ideal for families on tour.

Also available in an extra-deep size, the RMDT caravan fridge offers a deeper fridge cabinet for those who require maximum cooling storage. Get the benefit of a higher capacity fridge without sacrificing the height or width of the fridge.

Cool innovation

This Dometic 3-way fridge can operate on 12V, 230V and butane or propane gas, giving you great flexibility. A removable freezer lets you store your food in a way that works for you, and integrated LED light strips give you an excellent view of the interior. The included VG fresh fruit and veg crisper drawers let you perfectly preserve your fruit and veg with humidity control.

Easy control

Equipped with a TFT colour screen, which lets you monitor the power source currently in use. The fridge is able to automatically switch between power sources, making it easy to manage your energy usage.

RMDT Caravan Absorption Fridge Key Features

  • Built-in oven
  • Extra-deep model available
  • Large storage capacity with a total volume of 1531L/1771L
  • 3 way power for gas, 12v and 240v use
  • Dual-hinged door and recessed TFT controls

Product Description:
Foxygen 12V 105Ah Lithium Leisure Battery With Heating And Bluetooth Connectivity

Make The Most Of Off Grid Power For Your Campervan, Motorhome, Caravan, Or Boat.

Ridge Monkey Grilla BBQ Dual Fuel Edition

The RidgeMonkey Grilla BBQ Dual Fuel Edition is the ultimate portable stainless steel barbecue, built for incredible versatility and convenience on all your outdoor trips. Compact when folded yet ultra-sturdy in use, this model offers you the freedom to cook with either gas or solid fuel.

The gas functionality features a powerful full-length burner with fully adjustable heat and reliable piezo ignition, compatible with all EN417 screw-fitting gas bottles. Want authentic smoky flavour? Simply remove the gas burner and use charcoal or wood underneath.

The generous railed grill ensures no more lost sausages while offering ample space for all your meats and vegetables. This high-quality unit includes a handy removable stainless steel side table for preparation and a deluxe stainless steel utensil set. Everything packs away neatly into the included protective carry case**, making transport and storage simple.

Grilla BBQ Dual Fuel Edition Features

  • Railed grill – no more lost sausages!
  • Quick and easy to use
  • Full stainless steel body
  • Removable stainless steel side table
  • Unique space-saving folding mechanism
  • Deluxe stainless steel utensil set included
  • Protective carry case included
  • Protected registered design
  • Full length burner with adjustable heat and piezo ignition
  • Compatible with all EN417 screw fitting gas bottles
  • Can be used with charcoal and other solid fuels if desired

Product Name: Ridge Monkey Grilla CookStation Double Burner
Product Description:
Ridge Monkey Grilla CookStation Double Burner

Master the art of mobile cooking with the RidgeMonkey Grilla CookStation Double Burner, a unique and portable hybrid combining the stability of the Quad Connect Pro Stove and the surface area of the Grilla BBQ. Its low-profile folding design features a thermally robust, easy-to-clean stainless steel construction that packs neatly away into the included carry bag. The twin burners are simple to use, offering easy-ignite and fully adjustable flames for precise temperature control. A built-in pre-heat pipe optimises gas vaporisation for efficient performance, especially in cold weather.

Ideal for use on any tabletop, the rubber-capped folding legs and pan support ensure rock-solid stability, while dual drop-down rubber-gripped handles allow for safe, easy movement. Complete with a removable stainless steel side table for preparation, this cooker is the ultimate space-saving solution for comfortable and efficient outdoor food preparation.

Product Name: YETI Ice Block for Cool Box
Product Description:
YETI Cool Box Ice Block

Heavy Duty Frozen Ice Packs

Food and drink stay ice-cold for longer using the YETI Ice Blocks. Available in different sizes, the YETI ice packs come as a 450g, 900g, or 1.8kg blocks, varying sizes to fit your needs. Fits perfectly in your YETI Tundra, Roadie and Hopper, or comfortably slot into any cooler of your choice!

Designed for maximum coolness, these ice packs are the ultimate reusable ice substitute on the market. Built using tough material to withstand the roughest conditions, these ice blocks will never crack or leak, ensuring a long lifespan and maximum cooling performance. Whether you're camping, fishing, road-tripping or packing a lunch, these impact-resistant ice substitutes will keep your cool box colder for longer and are made to last season after season.

For best results, pre-chill your cooler and use YETI ICE alongside regular ice or other frozen goods.

Reusable Ice Block Key Features:

  • Stays Colder Longer: Chills content faster and helps keep your ice colder for longer
  • Freezes Faster: The custom shape and formula help reduce freezer time, so you're ready to go sooner
  • Impact Resistant: Impact-resistant and built to withstand drops and rugged use in the wild
  • Reusable & Mess-free: Unlike regular ice, YETI ICE won't create puddles or leaks in your cooler

Choose from 450g, 900g, and 1.8 kg blocks to suit your cooler size and packing strategy

  • Small (450g / 1lb) – Ideal for lunch boxes or small soft coolers. H6.7 x L20.3cm
  • Medium (900g / 2lb) – Great for day trips and mid-size cool boxes. H9.2 x L20cm
  • Large (1.8kg / 4lb) – Best for multi-day coolers and extended use. H27.3 x 20.3cm

Product Name: Ridge Monkey Connect Combi & Steamer XXL
Product Description:
Ridge Monkey Connect Combi & Steamer XXL

Simplify your outdoor menu with the ultimate multi-function unit; the RidgeMonkey Connect Combi & Steamer XXL, eliminating the need to carry multiple pots and pans.

It features a unique detachable hinge system that separates the unit into two pans: a deep-sided flat-bottom frying pan and a four-section pan for cooking multiple items at once. Additionally, a removable heat-resistant steamer tray is included, instantly converting the set into a food steamer. The granite-style coating makes the pans tougher, more durable, and provides a non-stick surface. Built from lightweight aluminium with a sleek Gunmetal Grey finish, it includes removable, magnetic cool-touch handles that pack away neatly in their protective pouch, making this PFOA-free and BPA-free set the best solution for compact, versatile outdoor cooking.

Product Description:
YETI Tundra 45 Litre Cool Box

Heavy Duty Camping Cooler for Outdoor Adventures

The Tundra 45 is a outdoors ice chest designed with tough construction, made for fishing, camping, boating, barbecuing and beer drinking! Available in four colours including White, Charcoal & Tan! Reputed for its superior ice retention and its thick, freezer-grade insulation that keeps ice frozen for days on end. The YETI Tundra 45 Cool Box is a camping essential for your next outdoor adventure! Able to store food and drink enough for four people, this YETI cooler is ideal for overnight camping trips! Featuring rotomolded construction and a bearproof design, this ice box is virtually indestructible, making it guaranteed to last year after year.

Built to withstand the toughest conditions and easily securable using the built-in non-slip feet that keep this cooler steady and the tie-down points for easy securing. An ideal solution that won't blow away in the wind, but remains extremely portable thanks to its heavy duty handles that make it super easy to carry.

YETI Tundra 45 Camping Cooler Key Features:

  • T-Rex Lid Latches: Heavy-duty, patented, and made to never break
  • Permafrost Insulation: Pressure-injected polyurethane locks in that just-packed temperature
  • Doublehaul Handles: Made from military-grade polyester ropes
  • Bearfoot Non-Slip Feet: Prevents sliding on the boat or in the backseat of your vehicle
  • Vortex Drain System: Leakproof and designed for quick and easy draining
  • Bearproof Design: When used with extra-long shank Master Lock Padlocks

Product Description:
YETI Roadie Cool Box Storage Basket

Organisation Box for YETI Cooler

The best storage solution to upgrade your YETI Roadie Cool Box! Ensure your food and drink stay organised and dry with these handy storage baskets! Each basket fits soundly inside your coolbox, meaning it won't rattle or slide while on the move. Ideal for weekend getaways, fishing, camping trips, and beach barbecues. Maximise the storage space inside your coolbox and ensure your snacks are easy to reach.

Please Note: Each YETI Roadie Wheeled Coolers come standard with one cooler basket but can accommodate two. The small basket is compatible with the Roadie 15. The medium basket is compatible with the Roadie 24 and 32. The large basket is compatible with the Roadie 48 and 60, and the YETI Tundra Haul.

YETI Cooler Storage Basket Key Features:

  • Elevated Design: Keeps food and gear dry and separate from ice melting
  • Custom Fit: Compatible with select YETI Roadie and Tundra models

The Fogstar Drift 628Ah LiFePO4 battery is the ultimate power solution for larger campervans, caravans, motorhomes, boats, and high-demand off-grid systems. With a massive 628Ah capacity, this high-performance battery is perfect for powering large 12V DC electrical systems and high-wattage appliances, making it ideal for extended off-grid living and powering multiple devices simultaneously.

The Fogstar Drift 628Ah battery is suitable for use with inverters up to 3000W, making it an excellent choice for powering a variety of electrical setups, from leisure applications to more demanding professional use. It delivers reliable 12V power and is built tough with an IP67 rating, ensuring protection from dust, water, and harsh environments. Its compact yet powerful design ensures it fits easily into your setup while providing outstanding performance. Plus, with 3500 cycles at 80% Depth of Discharge (DoD), this battery offers an impressive lifespan, far surpassing traditional wet lead-acid batteries.

Fogstar’s 10-year warranty ensures that you can rely on this battery for dependable power for years to come, whether you're in a campervan, caravan, motorhome, boat, or using it as part of a larger off-grid solar or backup system.

Built-in Battery Monitoring System

The Fogstar Drift batteries come with a built-in Bluetooth-enabled battery monitoring system. This advanced system provides real-time tracking of voltage, current, and power, so you can monitor the health of your battery anytime. It also includes temperature control and protection notifications, ensuring the reliability and safety of your off-grid electrical system.

Product Name: Mestic MCCP 35L Compressor Cooler UK 12V AC/DC Cool Box
Product Description:
Mestic MCCP 35L Compressor Cooler UK 12V AC/DC Cool Box

Take the comfort of home wherever you go with the Mestic MCCP-35 Compressor Cool Box. Compact yet powerful, this 35L single-zone cooler keeps your food and drinks perfectly chilled or frozen, from -18°C to +20°C, no matter the weather outside. Thanks to its advanced compressor technology, the cooling performance stays consistent even in scorching summer heat, making it ideal for road trips, camping adventures, or days out on the water.

The MCCP-35 is designed with true convenience in mind: the lid opens from both sides and can be fully removed for easy access, while the digital control panel lets you set the temperature precisely and charge your devices via dual USB ports. With dual 12–24V and 100–240V connections, you can use it both on the road and at home without any extra adapters. A removable wire basket and interior lighting make organizing your items effortless.

Durable, efficient, and incredibly user-friendly, the Mestic MCCP-35 is your go-to companion for cool comfort on every adventure.

Mestic MCCP Compressor Features

  • Digital display

Mestic MCCM 35L Compressor Cool Box UK AC/DC Cooler

Keep your food and drinks perfectly chilled wherever you go with the Mestic MCCM-35 Compressor Cool Box. Featuring an advanced compressor cooling system with R600A refrigerant, this smart cooler delivers powerful performance with a temperature range from -20°C to +20°C, all while operating quietly at under 38 dB.
