Product Description:
Dometic RainTec RT200 Campervan Door Gutter for Fiat Ducato, Mercedes Sprinter, Ford Transit & VW Crafter

Sliding Door Rain Gutter for Converted Vans

Introducing the all new rain gutter for converted campervan sliding doors! Familiar with the "automatic shower" phenomenon when opening your campervans sliding door? Then this retrofit gutter is just for you! Featuring a sturdy design that blocks rainwater and drains it to the side to keep you dry when opening and closing your vans door.

Also fitted with a handy dimmable LED light strip controlled via remote control. Comes complete as a set with included mounting material for gutter and remote control to easily switch on and continuously dim LEDs. Ideal for retrofitting and optionally compatible with Fiat Ducato, Mercedes Sprinter, Ford Transit & VW Crafter sliding doors. Fiat Ducato model is also compatible with Peugeot Boxer and Citro­ën Jumper vans sliding doors.

Product Description:
Mestic MCCP 60L Compressor Cooler UK 12V AC/DC Cool Box

Take the comfort of home wherever you go with the Mestic MCCP-60L Compressor Cool Box. Compact yet powerful, this 35L single-zone cooler keeps your food and drinks perfectly chilled or frozen, from -18°C to +20°C, no matter the weather outside. Thanks to its advanced compressor technology, the cooling performance stays consistent even in scorching summer heat, making it ideal for road trips, camping adventures, or days out on the water.

The MCCP-60L is designed with true convenience in mind: the lid opens from both sides and can be fully removed for easy access, while the digital control panel lets you set the temperature precisely and charge your devices via dual USB ports. With dual 12–24V and 100–240V connections, you can use it both on the road and at home without any extra adapters. A removable wire basket and interior lighting make organizing your items effortless.

Durable, efficient, and incredibly user-friendly, the Mestic MCCP-60L is your go-to companion for cool comfort on every adventure.

Mestic MCCP 60L Cooler Features

  • Single zone
  • 60L capacity
  • Digital display
  • 2 USB ports
  • Lid can be opened on both sides
  • Removable baskets

Product Description:
Fiamma Carry Bike Pro N

2023 Restyled Motorhome Bike Rack

Introducing the new Carry Bike Pro N new 2023 model! As standard this rack can carry up to two bikes, or upgrade this motorhome carry bike to carry up to four bikes or 2 E-bikes (with additional parts).

Designed for durability, this compact bike can be installed below the rear window of your van for ease of installation and to allow the window to open. The Carry Bike Pro N does not come with the fixings, making it perfect for motorhomes with pre-existing fixing rails. Able to hold a maximum capacity of 4 bikes, this bike rack is ideal for the whole family.

Please note: we cannot accept returns on bike racks. Please ensure this item is compatible with your vehicle before purchasing.

  • Height-adjustable frame
  • Designed for pre-installed fixing rails

  • Bike-Block Pro scratch-proof bike locks
  • Sturdy rails with reinforced base delivered with Quick-Safe straps
  • Rack Holder safety carrier lock
  • Support Bar Kit for easy installation with included lower fixings with bar

Product Name: Adventurer Universal Awning & Tent Tie Down Kit
Product Description:
Adventurer Universal Tie Down Kit

Secure Awning Storm Pegs for Caravan and Motorhome

The Adventurer Universal Tie Down Kit is built tough for all terrains and conditions. Ensure your awning stays secure and steady no matter the weather. This awning tie down kit provides a reliable anchor for your setup, making it ideal for camping tents, caravan awnings, and motorhome awnings.

The kit features heavy-duty galvanised steel for exceptional corrosion resistance and strength. It uses weatherproof polypropylene filament webbing for dependable anchoring and has a handy quick-attach design that specifically fits the majority of awnings equipped with sewn-in clips, guaranteeing a fast setup and a strong, dependable hold. Expertly crafted to provide maximum stability for your awning setup, no matter the weather. Thanks to the high compatibility of the Adventurer tie down kit, ensure your awning or tent remains secure, giving you peace of mind in harsh winds and rain.

Universal storm straps, suitable for awnings and tents with pre-existing female buckles already stitched to your caravan awning. We recommend you check compatibility before ordering. Featuring a selection of straps for heavy duty usage. Included adjustable webbing straps for securing your awning in place. Suitable for a range of awnings including Fiamma, Thule, Dometic, Dorema, Quest, Star Camp, Camptech, NR and Sunncamp. Just what's needed in British weather!

Adventurer Universal Tie Down Kit Features:

  • Ideal for awnings with sewn-in clips
  • Heavy-duty cold-rolled galvanised steel for corrosion resistance and strength
  • A3 wire iron with colour-plated zinc finish for enhanced durability
  • Polypropylene filament webbing for weatherproof anchoring
  • Quick-attach design fits most awnings with sewn-in clips
  • Ideal for caravans, motorhomes, and tents in all terrains
  • Bright colours to prevent trip hazards
  • 14pc set

What's in the box?

  • Variety of Storm Straps
  • Variety of Buckles & Clips
  • Tensions Springs
  • Steel Ground Stakes

Product Name: Fiamma F45 Awning Bracket Ducato Relay/Jumper Boxer After 2006 H2
Option Set: F45 Awning Ducato Relay/Jumper Boxer - H2 - After 2006
Product Description:
Fiamma F45S Awning Bracket Kits for Fiat Ducato / Peugeot Boxer / Citroën Relay – H2 Roof (2006 Onwards)

Designed for secure fitting of Fiamma F45s awnings across MWB, LWB and XLWB models

Upgrade your campervan or motorhome with these Fiamma F45S awning bracket kits, engineered specifically for the Fiat Ducato, Peugeot Boxer and Citroën Relay (2006 onwards) with an H2 high roof. Each kit is tailored to match the correct wheelbase L2, L3 or L4. Ensuring a secure, accurate and manufacturer approved installation.

These genuine Fiamma brackets provide a strong mounting solution for F45s wind-out awnings and fit directly to the vehicle’s pre-existing factory fixing points, meaning no drilling, no bodywork modifications and a quick, clean installation.

What’s Included:

  • 98655Z200 Kit – 3 × vehicle-specific mounting brackets
  • 98655Z201 Kit – 2 × 8 cm awning mounting brackets

Recommended Awning Lengths by Vehicle Wheelbase:

  • Fiat Ducato / Peugeot Boxer / Citroën Relay – 2006 Onwards – H2 L2 (MWB): Compatible with Fiamma F45s 350cm
  • Fiat Ducato / Peugeot Boxer / Citroën Relay – 2006 Onwards – H2 L3 (LWB): Compatible with Fiamma F45s 375cm
  • Fiat Ducato / Peugeot Boxer / Citroën Relay – 2006 Onwards – H2 L4 (XLWB): Compatible with Fiamma F45s 400cm

Please Note:

For H2 L4 (XLWB) vehicles, two sets of the 98655Z200 bracket kit are required to safely support the full awning length. When you select L4 from our wheelbase dropdown, your order will automatically update to include the correct number of bracket kits—no additional action required.
Product Availability: Sent within 1-2 working days!

Product Name: Ridge Monkey Quad Connect Pro Full Kit
Product Description:
Ridge Monkey Quad Connect Pro Full Kit

Introducing the RidgeMonkey Quad Connect Pro Full Kit, the only stove system on the market featuring an independently controllable, completely removable second stove head. This innovative design uses a quick-release connector built into the primary stove, allowing you to run twin 2700W high-power burners simultaneously from a single gas bottle - perfect for complex meals, boiling the kettle, or catering.

Built with RidgeMonkey’s stable quadrilateral design, this stove has an incredibly low centre of gravity, four height-adjustable folding legs, and a remote gas connection, guaranteeing a rock-solid setup on virtually any terrain. The inclusion of an all-new gas condenser pipe ensures efficient fuel burn, even in the coldest conditions. Constructed with durable stainless steel and featuring remote Piezo ignition, this flexible, high-performance kit comes complete with a carry bag, toaster handle support, and a gas bottle stand.

Quad Connect Pro Full Kit Features

  • Super stable design
  • Stainless steel braided hoses & bodywork
  • Height-adjustable folding legs
  • Twin 2700W high-power output
  • Quick release connector
  • Gas condenser pipe
  • Remote Piezo ignition
  • Includes carry bag, toaster handle support and gas bottle stand
  • Suitable for use with all EN417 ISO screw thread equipped butane/ propane mixture cylinders

Ridge Monkey Quad Connect Specification

  • Folded: 130mm x 130mm x 130mm
  • Fully Extended: 180mm x 180mm x 105mm

Product Name: Shurflo RV Pressurised Water Pump for Caravan & Motorhome
Product Description:
Shurflo RV Water Pump

Pressurised Water Pump for Motorhome and Caravan

Shurflo RV Pump is designed for caravan, motorhome and campervan owners who require reliable water pressure at campsites. The next generation of water pumps, made to deliver high flow pressure on demand, dampened vibration noise, reduced pulsing and the elimination of rapid cycling. Giving you a smooth, quieter and more reliable water system wherever you travel.

With next generation performance with four independent pump champers for an ultra-smooth, even flow. The perfect upgrade or replacement for old pumps and pumps that don't perform to a high standard. Easy installation, fits the same installation space as 2095 series pumps. The RV 12V 7.6L 30PSI model (4029-281-B32K) features an Elasformer Base Plate, meaning it will not directly fit the same base footprint as the 2095 series and 40x9 series with metal base, due to different screw hole centres (73x83mm) instead of (57x81mm).

Supplied with optional fittings including 2 x John Guest fittings or 1 x angled hose connector and 1 x straight hose connector, to fit a 12mm diameter flexible hose. Please Note: For flexi hose connectors you will need to order the length of 12mm water pipe separately. Alternatively, John Guest fittings are only compatible with John Guest pipe and are not suitable for 12mm flexible hose.

All Shurflo Trail King Pumps are water tested by Shurlfo in their factory prior to shipping. Some residual water may be present during installation. This is not a fault or sign of previous use.

High Pressure Pump Key Features:

  • Adjustable pressure shut-off micro switch for tailored system control
  • Thermal overload protection
  • Built-in check valve to prevent back-flow
  • 12V/24V 3" diameter motor
  • Dampened noise, quieter operation
  • Reduced cycling with Flow Reaction technology
  • Internal bypass - low cycling
  • Run-dry safe design for added reliability
  • Self-priming to 6 vertical feet
  • 4 independent pump champers for smooth even flow
  • Built for power, built to last
  • Fits the same installation space as 2095 Trail King series pumps
  • Elasformer base plate (RV 12V 7.6L 30PSI model only)
